NK106(me)003:1: // a ba bo d+hi su pa n+th+aa ma h+aa sa
NK106(me)003:2: n+d+hi tsi n+t+aa bi sra n+ta s+ya tri s+th+aa n+aa
NK106(me)003:3: n+aam stri k+she m+aa n+aa ma r+tha na ya nam
NK106(me)003:5: rdzogs pa chen po sems nyid ngal gso'i gnas gsum
NK106(me)003:6: dge ba gsum gyi don khrid byang chub lam bzang
NK106(me)003:8: tshogs gnyis sa gzhir rnam grol dpag bsam shing //
NK106(me)003:9: mtha' yas yon tan me tog 'bras bkra zhing //
NK106(me)003:10: phan bde'i grib bsil srid zhi'i dbyings kun khyab //
NK106(me)003:11: rgyal ba'i byang chub ljon shing la phyag 'tshal //
NK106(me)003:12: phyi nang gsang ba'i dam chos rin chen gter //
NK106(me)003:13: gzhi lam 'bras bu'i gzhung lam mthar phyin nas //
NK106(me)003:14: rgyu 'bras bla med theg mchog snying po'i don //
NK106(me)003:15: dge ba gsum gyi khrid yig gsal bar bya //
NK106(me)003:16: de la phyi thun mong gi gzhi rgyu mtshan nyid kyi theg pa thog mar dge ba'i khrid /
NK106(me)003:17: nang khyad par gyi 'bras bu gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa bar du dge ba'i khrid /
NK106(me)003:18: gsang ba nges don snying po'i 'bras bu rdzogs pa
NK106(me)003:19: chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa tha mar
NK106(me)003:20: dge ba'i khrid dang gsum bzhugs pa las /
NK106(me)003:22: bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa dang /
NK106(me)003:23: nyams su blang ba'i gdams khrid do //
NK106(me)003:24: dang po la theg pa chen po'i gzhung lam so
NK106(me)003:25: so la ltos nas bdag gis thos pa'i rim pa
NK106(me)003:26: mang yang / gdams ngag gi gnas nges pa gsum du bsdu bas /
NK106(me)003:27: bstan pa la rim gyis bslab pa rgya chen spyod pa'i brgyud pa dang /
NK106(me)003:28: sa lam ting nge 'dzin drod tshad bstan pa zab cing rgya che ba'i brgyud pa dang /
NK106(me)003:29: chos nyid don gyi gnas lugs bstan pa zab mo lta ba'i brgyud pa dang gsum /
NK106(me)003:41: lo ts+aa ba blo ldan shes rab /
NK106(me)003:42: tshe spong ba chos kyi bla ma /
NK106(me)003:43: ph+y+aa pa chos kyi seng ge /
NK106(me)003:44: dan 'bag pa dar ma bkra shis /
NK106(me)003:48: dben dge ba sh+aakya seng ge /
NK106(me)003:49: bla brang ba chos dpal rgyal mtshan /
NK106(me)003:50: bsam yas pa tshul khrims blo gros /
NK106(me)003:60: rnam par snang mdzad bzang po /
NK106(me)003:74: chu mig pa seng ge dpal /
NK106(me)003:76: de la btsan dgon pa dang /
NK106(me)003:78: de gnyis la bla brang pa dang /
NK106(me)003:80: de gnyis la bdag gis thug go //
NK106(me)003:87: ku s+aa li pa che ba /
NK106(me)003:92: byang chub sems dpa' zla ba rgyal mtshan /
NK106(me)003:94: spyi bo lhas pa byang chub 'od /
NK106(me)003:99: slob dpon gzhon nu rdo rje /
NK106(me)003:100: des bsam yas pa ngag gi dbang po la'o //
NK106(me)003:101: gzhan yang jo bo bka' rgyud kyi brgyud pa'ang yod de ma bris so //
NK106(me)003:102: yon tan rang bzhin bde legs phun sum tshogs //
NK106(me)003:103: bkra shis mchog gi lha yi lhar gyur pa //
NK106(me)003:104: thugs rje'i rang bzhin phan bde'i sprin tshogs can //
NK106(me)003:105: dpal mgon bla ma'i tshogs la gus phyag 'tshal //
NK106(me)003:106: don gnyis nyams su blang ba'i gdams khrid la /
NK106(me)003:111: dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa /
NK106(me)003:114: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa bslab bya dang bcas pa ste rdo rje'i gnas brgyad las /
NK106(me)003:116: ngo bo dal ba bsam pa /
NK106(me)003:119: thob daka'i dpe la bsam pa /
NK106(me)003:120: rim pa'i rnam dbye bsam pa /
NK106(me)003:121: don med chud zos bsam pa /
NK106(me)003:125: spro dga' mchog tu bsam pa'o //
NK106(me)003:127: mi khom pa'i gnas brgyad bsam pa ste /
NK106(me)003:128: rang nyid der ma lhung bas kyang dal ba thob
NK106(me)003:129: pa la dga' ba bskyed de chos bsgrub pa la
NK106(me)003:130: brtson par bya'o // de'ang dmyal bar skyes na tsha
NK106(me)003:131: grang gi sdug bsngal la spyod spyod nas chos sgrub
NK106(me)003:132: brtson par bya'o // pa'i gnas med / yi dgas
NK106(me)003:133: su skyes na bkres skom gyi me 'bar bas chos
NK106(me)003:135: dud 'gror skyes na gcig la gcig za la sogs pas 'tshe bas chos sgrub pa'i gnas med /
NK106(me)003:136: lha tshe ring por skyes nas 'du shes med pa'i
NK106(me)003:137: ngang du bskal par 'byams nas 'chi khar log par
NK106(me)003:138: blta bas chos sgrub pa'i gnas med /
NK106(me)003:139: yul mtha' 'khob tu skyes na bstan pa'i snang ba med pas chos sgrub pa'i gnas med /
NK106(me)003:140: mu stegs byed la sogs par skyes na log par lta bas chos sgrub pa'i gnas med /
NK106(me)003:141: mun pa'i bskal pa la skyes na dkon mchog gsum
NK106(me)003:142: gyi sgra mi grags pas chos sgrub pa'i gnas med
NK106(me)003:143: / lkugs par skyes na yid kyi dbang po snod
NK106(me)003:144: du ma rung bas chos sgrub pa'i gnas med do
NK106(me)003:145: / // de bas na brgyad po der da ltar bdag ma skyes pas khom pa zhes bya ste /
NK106(me)003:146: chos sgrub pa la brtson par bya snyam pa ste /
NK106(me)003:147: de'ang skyabs su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed nas /
NK106(me)003:148: mi khom pa brgyad dang de las log pa dal
NK106(me)003:149: ba thob pa'i rang bzhin la bsam ste chos kho
NK106(me)003:150: na bya snyam pa yang nas yang du bsams la
NK106(me)003:151: / rjes dge ba bsngo zhing spyod lam thams cad du yang de ltar bsam pa la sbyar ro //
NK106(me)003:153: de nas khyad par 'byor pa bsam pa ni /
NK106(me)003:154: mi'i lus ma thob na chos byar med pa las /
NK106(me)003:155: mir skyes pas kyang rang nyid 'byor pa dang /
NK106(me)003:156: yul phyogs chos med par skyes na'ang chos spyod du med pa las /
NK106(me)003:157: chos dar ba ni don gyi yul dbus su skyes pas kyang rang nyid 'byor pa dang /
NK106(me)003:158: dbang po ma tshang na'ang chos byar med pa las /
NK106(me)003:159: dbang po'i sgo tshang bas kyang rang nyid 'byor pa dang /
NK106(me)003:160: las kyi mtha' log nas rtag tu mi dge ba la spyod na'ang chos byar med pa las /
NK106(me)003:161: las kyi mtha' ma log par dge ba la mos pas kyang rang nyid 'byor pa dang /
NK106(me)003:162: bstan pa la ma dad na'ang chos spyad du med pa las /
NK106(me)003:163: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad pas kyang rang nyid 'byor pa ste lnga tshang la /
NK106(me)003:164: sangs rgyas 'jig rten du ma byon na chos kyi ming med pa las /
NK106(me)003:165: da res sangs rgyas byon pas kyang gzhan 'byor dam pa tshang ba dang /
NK106(me)003:166: sangs rgyas byon yang chos ma gsungs na phan med pa las /
NK106(me)003:167: chos kyi 'khor lo gsum du bskor bas kyang gzhan 'byor dam pa tshang ba dang /
NK106(me)003:168: chos gsungs kyang bstan pa mi gnas na phan med pa las /
NK106(me)003:169: da lta bstan pa ma nub tsam du yod pas kyang gzhan 'byor dam pa tshang ba dang /
NK106(me)003:170: bstan pa gnas kyang ma zhugs na phan med pa las /
NK106(me)003:171: bstan pa la zhugs pas kyang gzhan 'byor tshang ba dang /
NK106(me)003:172: zhugs kyang mthun rkyen dge ba'i bshes gnyen med na blang dor gyi gnas mi shes pa las /
NK106(me)003:173: yang dag pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi snying brtse
NK106(me)003:174: ba lhag pa'i thugs rjes yongs su 'dzin mkhan yod
NK106(me)003:175: pas kyang gzhan 'byor dam pa lnga tshang ba ste
NK106(me)003:176: / da res 'byor pa'i phun sum tshogs pa bcu
NK106(me)003:177: rang gi steng du legs par tshang ba'i skabs 'dir
NK106(me)003:178: snying nas dal 'byor don yod par bya snyam pa
NK106(me)003:179: / ste / sbyor ba skyabs 'gro sems bskyed /
NK106(me)003:180: dngos gzhi 'byor pa'i rgyu mtshan bsam pa /
NK106(me)003:181: rjes bsngo ba dang spyod lam rnal 'byor du bya'o //
NK106(me)003:183: de nas ngan 'gro'i g.yang sa bsam pa ni /
NK106(me)003:184: da res dal 'byor thob pa'i rten la dam pa'i
NK106(me)003:185: chos shig ma bsgrub na las kyi dbang gis shi
NK106(me)003:186: ba'i 'og tu ngan song gsum du skyes dus chos
NK106(me)003:188: dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang yang mi mjal /
NK106(me)003:189: dge sdig gi ngo yang mi shes /
NK106(me)003:190: gang ci byed thams cad sdig pa ma gtogs pa dge ba med pas /
NK106(me)003:191: rtag tu 'khor ba na 'khor ba 'di mtshang re
NK106(me)003:192: che na ang snyam pa ste sbyor ba dngos gzhi
NK106(me)003:193: mjug gi rim pa gsum gyis nyams su de ltar
NK106(me)003:194: blang ngo // khrid rkang gsum pa'o //
NK106(me)003:195: de nas thob daka'i dpe la bsam pa ni /
NK106(me)003:196: rgya mtsho chen po rlung gis bskyod pa'i steng na gnya' shing bu ga gcig pa /
NK106(me)003:197: gcig tu mi gnas par chu'i rlabs kyis 'khyer ba
NK106(me)003:198: dang chu'i 'og na rus sbal zhar ba lo brgya
NK106(me)003:199: brgya na steng du lan cig 'ong ba de 'dzom
NK106(me)003:200: nas / gnya' shing gi bug par rus sbal gyi mgrin pa tshud pa bas /
NK106(me)003:201: ngan song las mi lus thob pa dka' ba dang /
NK106(me)003:202: gyang gi zhal ba 'jam po la sran ma spar
NK106(me)003:203: gang gtor na gcig tsam chags pa yang dka' bas
NK106(me)003:204: mi lus thob dka' ba bsam ste sbyor dngos rjes
NK106(me)003:205: gsum tshang bas nyams su blang ngo //
NK106(me)003:207: de rim pa'i rnam dbye bsal ba ni /
NK106(me)003:208: spyir sems can tsam gyi rim pa dang grangs la
NK106(me)003:209: bsams na mi lus thob pa srid pa tsam la
NK106(me)003:210: / mi la'ang chos med pa rtag tu sdig pa la spyod pa rnams la bsams na /
NK106(me)003:211: chos la mos pa dang chos thos pa srid pa tsam ste /
NK106(me)003:212: de las kyang snying nas yang dag pa'i chos kyi
NK106(me)003:213: sgor zhugs pa dang spyod pa srid pa tsam la
NK106(me)003:214: bsams te / yang dag pa'i bla ma dang mjal /
NK106(me)003:216: thar pa'i lam la bslab tu yod pa mi lus
NK106(me)003:217: rin po che thob pa 'di la 'bad dgos snyam
NK106(me)003:218: du sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas nyams su blang
NK106(me)003:220: de nas don med chud zos bsam pa ni /
NK106(me)003:221: nor bu'i gling du phyin nas stong par log na rgya mtshor phyin pa don med pa ltar /
NK106(me)003:222: da res mi lus rin po che'i gling du phyin nas /
NK106(me)003:223: dam pa'i chos kyi nor sna re ma blangs /
NK106(me)003:224: thar pa'i lam sna ma zin /
NK106(me)003:225: tshe 'di'i bya bas g.yengs na mi lus rin po
NK106(me)003:226: che thob kyang stong log byas pa yin snyam du
NK106(me)003:227: sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas nyams su blang zhing
NK106(me)003:230: de nas rgyu rkyen rten 'brel bsam pa ni /
NK106(me)003:231: dam chos sgrub pa sems la rag cing sems de dal 'byor gyi lus la brten nas /
NK106(me)003:232: mthun pa'i rten 'brel tshogs pa'ang dka' la /
NK106(me)003:233: nad med pa dang sdug bsngal gyis ma gzir ba dang /
NK106(me)003:234: gzhan dbang du ma gyur pa dang /
NK106(me)003:235: rang dbang thob pa'i rten la ci nas kyang chos la 'bad dgos snyam pa /
NK106(me)003:236: sbyor ba skyabs 'gro sems bskyed byas rting yang dang
NK106(me)003:237: yang du snying nas dung dung bsgoms la rjes bsngo
NK106(me)003:238: ba dang spyod lam rnal 'byor du bya'o //
NK106(me)003:240: de nas skye shi'i 'khor lo bsam pa ni /
NK106(me)003:241: 'di ltar sems can thams cad khams gsum rigs drug na skye shi'i kha brgyud /
NK106(me)003:242: so so'i sdug bsngal la spyod kyang /
NK106(me)003:245: dal 'byor thob dus chud gsan cing chos la ma spyad pas lan par 'dug /
NK106(me)003:246: bdag gis dal 'byor don yod par bya snyam du sbyor dngos rjes gsum gyis nyams su blang ngo //
NK106(me)003:248: de nas dal 'byor gyi basngagasa pa bsam pa ni /
NK106(me)003:249: nyan rang gi dgra bcom dang /
NK106(me)003:250: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang dal 'byor gyi rten las thob cing /
NK106(me)003:251: gsang sngags kyi chos rlabs po che'ang dal 'byor kho na las 'grub la /
NK106(me)003:252: theg pa che chung gi chos thams cad kyi rten dal 'byor 'phags par gsungs pa'i phyir /
NK106(me)003:253: bdag gis kyang da res thar pa'i lam sna dal
NK106(me)003:254: 'byor 'di las zin par bya dgos snyam du sbyor
NK106(me)003:255: ba sems bskyed nas yang dang yang du bsam zhing
NK106(me)003:258: de nas spro dga' mchog tu bsam pa ni /
NK106(me)003:259: skyabs su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed nas /
NK106(me)003:260: phongs pas nor bu rnyed pa'i dga' ba ltar /
NK106(me)003:261: rang gi dal 'byor rnyed pa la lta zhing rmi lam yin nam /
NK106(me)003:262: nges par bden nam snyam du spro dga' chen po bskyed de /
NK106(me)003:263: da res dam pa'i chos sgrub snyam pa yang nas
NK106(me)003:264: yang du bya zhing rjes bsngo ba dang spyod lam
NK106(me)003:267: don gnyis pa tshe mi rtag pa bsam pa la bcu gnyis te /
NK106(me)003:268: rten phung po la bsams te mi rtag pa /
NK106(me)003:269: skye dgu'i bdag po la bsams te mi rtag pa /
NK106(me)003:270: snod bcud chags 'jig la bsams te mi rtag pa /
NK106(me)003:271: dam pa'i skye bo la bsams te mi rtag pa /
NK106(me)003:272: nam 'chi nges med la bsams te mi rtag pa /
NK106(me)003:273: 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin la bsams te mi rtag pa /
NK106(me)003:274: 'chi rkyen drag po la bsams te mi rtag pa /
NK106(me)003:275: gcig pur 'gro ba la bsams te mi rtag pa /
NK106(me)003:276: dus kyi skye bo la bsams te mi rtag pa /
NK106(me)003:277: yid rten med pa la bsams te mi rtag pa /
NK106(me)003:278: rkyen snang nges med la bsams te mi rtag pa /
NK106(me)003:279: 'dun pa drag po la bsams te mi rtag pa'o //
NK106(me)003:281: rang dang gzhan gyi lus yan lag dang nying lag tu tshogs pa la bltas te /
NK106(me)003:282: da lta mthun pa'i zas gos bsten /
NK106(me)003:283: rgyan dang byi dor byas kyang /
NK106(me)003:284: nam zhig 'chi ba'i dus su gcer bu gos dang bral /
NK106(me)003:286: wa dang bya rgod kyis za /
NK106(me)003:288: rus pa'ang dum bu tha dad du 'gro ba'i gnas yod skabs yod na /
NK106(me)003:289: de bas na da lta nyid du dam pa'i chos
NK106(me)003:290: spyod dgos snyam du sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas
NK106(me)003:293: de nas skye dgu'i bdag po la bsams te mi rtag pa ni /
NK106(me)003:298: drang srong chen po rgyas pa dang /
NK106(me)003:299: grog mkhar ba la sogs pa gzugs bzang ba /
NK106(me)003:302: rig pa'i yon tan che ba /
NK106(me)003:303: spyan dang mngon shes mnga' ba /
NK106(me)003:304: rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa dag kyang 'chi ba'i skabs yod na /
NK106(me)003:305: bdag cag lta bu ci'i phyir mi 'chi /
NK106(me)003:306: de bas da lta dam pa'i chos sgrub snyam du sbyor dngos rjes gsum gyis nyams su blang ngo //
NK106(me)003:308: de nas snod bcud chags 'jig la bsams te mi rtag pa ni /
NK106(me)003:309: 'di ltar ri dang yul grus mtshon pa snod kyi
NK106(me)003:310: 'jig rten skyes pa bud med kyis mtshon pa bcud
NK106(me)003:311: kyi sems can thams cad bskal pa 'jig pa'i me
NK106(me)003:312: bdun chu gcig gis zhig nas stongs pa'i skabs yod
NK106(me)003:313: na / bdag cag lta bu ci'i phyir mi 'chi
NK106(me)003:314: snyam du sbyor dngos rjes gsum gyis nyams su blang
NK106(me)003:315: na / ngo // khrid rkang bcu gsum pa'o //
NK106(me)003:316: de nas dam pa'i skye bo la bsams te mi
NK106(me)003:317: rtag pa ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas rabs bdun 'khor
NK106(me)003:319: bar bar du rang sangs rgyas 'khor du tsam la sogs pa'ang snga phyir byon cing gshegs la /
NK106(me)003:320: de dag gi bstan pa dang bcas pa'ang dar ba dang nub pa'i rim pa mtha' yas na /
NK106(me)003:321: bdag cag lta bu nye 'khor dang bcas pa la rtag pa ga la yod /
NK106(me)003:322: de'i phyir da lta nyid nas dam pa'i chos sgrub
NK106(me)003:323: snyam du 'dun pa drag pos sbyor dngos rjes gsum
NK106(me)003:324: tshang bar nyams su blang ngo //
NK106(me)003:326: de nas nam 'chi nges med la bsams te mi rtag pa ni /
NK106(me)003:327: tshe la snon pa ni med /
NK106(me)003:328: 'brid pa ni nyin mtshan skad cig thang cig gis nyer song ste /
NK106(me)003:329: byi ba dkar nag gi rtsa thag gi nyag ma gcod pa dang 'dra /
NK106(me)003:330: gar 'chi cha med la 'chi ba'i rkyen mang bas
NK106(me)003:331: nam 'chi'i snyam pa ste sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang
NK106(me)003:334: de nas 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin la bsams te mi rtag pa ni /
NK106(me)003:335: spyir 'dus byas kyi chos mi rtag /
NK106(me)003:336: sgos su skyes bu'i tshe mi rtag /
NK106(me)003:337: khyad par lus sems tshogs pa'i rten mi rtag ste /
NK106(me)003:338: sngon dar zhing rgyas pa'i grong khyer dang /
NK106(me)003:339: sde dgon zhig ral stongs pa'i dpes /
NK106(me)003:340: rang gi lus grong lta bu /
NK106(me)003:341: sems mi rtag na bun lta bu nam stongs pa'i
NK106(me)003:342: skabs yong ngam snyam du snying nas sbyor dngos rjes
NK106(me)003:343: gsum tshang bar nyams su blang ngo //
NK106(me)003:345: de nas 'chi rkyen la bsams te mi rtag pa ni /
NK106(me)003:346: mar me 'bar ba ni myur du 'dzad pas mi
NK106(me)003:347: rtag pa la glo bur du rlung gis btab na
NK106(me)003:349: skyes nas 'chi bar phyogs pa la /
NK106(me)003:350: glo bur du nad dam gdon nam 'tshe ba drag
NK106(me)003:351: pos dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i rkyen byung na
NK106(me)003:352: skad cig kyang gnas dbang med pa'i phyir /
NK106(me)003:353: bdag la'ang de lta bu nam 'byung cha med snyam du /
NK106(me)003:355: dngos gzhi de nyid kho na la bsam pa /
NK106(me)003:356: mjug bsngo ba gsum gyis nyams su blang ngo //
NK106(me)003:358: de nas gcig pu 'gro ba la bsams te mi rtag pa ni /
NK106(me)003:360: phyi ma'i lam du ni zhugs /
NK106(me)003:362: zas dang gos kyi tha ma la spyod /
NK106(me)003:363: gtam gyi tha ma la smra ba'i tshe /
NK106(me)003:365: nye du 'brel pa la sogs pa thams cad bzhag
NK106(me)003:366: nas gcig pur 'gro dgos pa'i dus shig 'byung ste
NK106(me)003:368: bdag la'ang de lta bu nam 'byung cha med snyam
NK106(me)003:369: du sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas nyams su blang
NK106(me)003:370: ngo // khrid rkang bco brgyad pa'o //
NK106(me)003:371: de nas dus kyi skye bo la bsams te mi rtag pa ni /
NK106(me)003:372: 'di ltar lo brgya'i gong du 'das pa'i mi dang
NK106(me)003:373: dud 'gro la sogs pa'i sems can yod pa kun
NK106(me)003:374: da lta gcig kyang med la /
NK106(me)003:375: da lta sa steng gi sems can phal che'ang lo brgya'i 'og tu gcig kyang med par 'gyur la /
NK106(me)003:376: bdag kyang rang bzhin de las ma 'das shing /
NK106(me)003:377: ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyang de dang 'dra ste /
NK106(me)003:378: dus kyi lo thog barje ba ltar brnyings shing /
NK106(me)003:379: sngon bdag gis btsas pa'i yul gyi nang mi khyim mtshes /
NK106(me)003:382: dgra sdang ba na zla dang spun sring la sogs
NK106(me)003:383: pa med pa la bsams te sbyor dngos rjes gsum
NK106(me)003:386: de nas yid rten med pa la bsam ste mi rtag pa ni /
NK106(me)003:389: bar snang gi khams la sogs pa sa phyogs dang
NK106(me)003:390: 'dug sa ji lta bu na'ang 'chi bas mi tshugs
NK106(me)003:392: dus dang dus ma yin pa'i rkyen gyis 'chi la /
NK106(me)003:393: khyad par du mi'i yul na 'chi rkyen gyi 'tshe
NK106(me)003:394: ba shin tu mang ba'i phyir nam 'achi'am snyam du
NK106(me)003:395: / sbyor dngos rjes gsum gyis nyams su blang ngo //
NK106(me)003:397: de nas rkyen snang nges med la bsams te mi rtag pa ni /
NK106(me)003:398: 'chi rkyen glo bur ba med kyang nub ka'i grib so ltar 'chi bdag 'ong na /
NK106(me)003:406: tha na zas gos spyod lam nyes pas rkyen byas te 'chi ba shin tu mang bas /
NK106(me)003:407: bdag kyang nam 'achi'am snyam du snying thag pa nas
NK106(me)003:408: sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas nyams su blang ngo
NK106(me)003:409: // khrid rkang nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o //
NK106(me)003:410: de nas 'dun pa drag po la bsams te mi rtag pa ni /
NK106(me)003:411: gzhan du 'gro na da res 'achi'am gnas 'dir e log cha med do snyam pa dang /
NK106(me)003:412: lam du zhugs pa dang dal stegs la sdod na'ang 'dir 'achi'am snyam pa dang /
NK106(me)003:413: gang na 'dug kyang da res 'dir 'achi'am snyam pa dang /
NK106(me)003:416: nyal ba la sogs pa spyod lam ci byed kyang
NK106(me)003:417: 'jig rten 'di'i spyod lam gyi tha ma yin snyam
NK106(me)003:418: du 'chi ba 'ba' zhig dung dung bsgoms te /
NK106(me)003:420: dngos gzhi snying nas 'dun pa drag po /
NK106(me)003:421: rjes bsngo ba dang spyod lam rnal 'byor du bya'o //
NK106(me)003:422: khrid rkang nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o //
NK106(me)003:423: don gsum pa 'khor ba sdug bsngal du bsam pa la gsum ste /
NK106(me)003:425: sdug bsngal bye brag tu bsam pa /
NK106(me)003:426: da lta'i tshul la dpag pa'o //
NK106(me)003:428: 'adaltara khams gsum 'khor ba na 'khyams pa'i sems can 'di dag mngon par skyo ste /
NK106(me)003:429: 'khor ba brgyud mar 'khor dus sems can thams cad
NK106(me)003:430: gcig gis gcig gi pha ma gnyen 'dun mdza' bshes
NK106(me)003:431: bar ma dgra sdang ba ma byas pa med la
NK106(me)003:432: / rang nyid grog sbur gcig pur skyes pa'i mgo
NK106(me)003:433: dang rkang lag bsdoms te gcig tu phung por byar
NK106(me)003:434: yod na ri rab las ches mtho zhing /
NK106(me)003:435: ngus pa'i mchi ma rgya mtsho bas lhag la /
NK106(me)003:436: 'dod pa'i phyir mgo dang yan lag bcad pa'ang grangs med cing /
NK106(me)003:437: tshe 'dir phyug cing 'byor pa 'khor dang dbang phyug phun sum tshogs pa yang /
NK106(me)003:438: shi nas dbul zhing phongs pa'i gnas su skye ba
NK106(me)003:439: ni rmi lam gyi bde skyid gnyid sad nas med
NK106(me)003:441: tshe 'di'i snang ba la rang gzhan chags shing skyid
NK106(me)003:442: par snang ba'ang ngang tshul de las ma 'das pa'i
NK106(me)003:443: phyir gang gis kyang ci bya /
NK106(me)003:444: 'di bas phyi ma rgyun ring bas thar pa'i chos
NK106(me)003:445: la gnas par bya'o snyam du sbyor dngos rjes gsum
NK106(me)003:447: khrid rkang nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o //
NK106(me)003:448: de nas sdug bsngal bye brag tu bsam pa la drug las /
NK106(me)003:449: dmyal ba'ang tsha dmyal brgyad kyi sdug bsngal ni /
NK106(me)003:451: ma dag me 'bar ba'i yul khams su dmyal ba pa kun 'dus nas /
NK106(me)003:452: dgra bo mi sha bo gcig gis gcig mthong ba
NK106(me)003:453: ltar phan tshun las kyi mtshon chas gsod res byas
NK106(me)003:454: te shi ma thag yang sos par gyur cig gi
NK106(me)003:455: sgra nam mkha' la grags pas sos te /
NK106(me)003:456: yang 'chi yang sos pa la las ma zad bar du myong dgos pa'o //
NK106(me)003:458: lus la gshin rje'i skyes bus thig btab pa'i steng la lcags kyi sog les gshog cing /
NK106(me)003:459: gshags pa kun 'byar nas yang gshog pa'o //
NK106(me)003:461: lcags kyi gtun ljongs su phye ma zhib mor 'thag cing yang sos la yang 'thag pa dang /
NK106(me)003:463: rnga mo la sogs pa 'dra ba'i bar du 'joms pa'o //
NK106(me)003:465: lcags zhun bskol bar 'tshod cing lus la me 'bar bas ngu zhing 'o dod 'bod pa'o //
NK106(me)003:467: lcags khang nyis rim du bcug nas mes bsreg cing gshin rje'i me'i tho bas 'joms pa'o //
NK106(me)003:468: tsha ba ni lcags zangs khol mar 'tshod cing nang lto nas me 'bar ba'o //
NK106(me)003:470: lcags khyim me 'bar bar bsreg cing mdung rtse gsum
NK106(me)003:471: pas phrag pa gnyis dang spyi bo phug ste lcags
NK106(me)003:473: mnar med ni lcags khang me 'bar ba 'khor lhag
NK106(me)003:474: pa bcu drug gis bskor ba'i nang du sngar gyi
NK106(me)003:475: sdug bsngal thams cad myong zhing /
NK106(me)003:476: me dang 'dres pas na smre sngags tsam 'don pa'o //
NK106(me)003:477: de dag kyang tshor ba bdun 'gyur gyis rags pas sdug bsngal bdun 'gyur gyis che ba'o //
NK106(me)003:478: de lta bu'i dmyal ba nas bzod dka' ba'i sdug bsngal yod pas /
NK106(me)003:479: da res der ma skyes pa zhig ci nas kyang
NK106(me)003:480: bya dgos snyam du sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas
NK106(me)003:482: khrid rkang nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
NK106(me)003:483: de nas nye 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las /
NK106(me)003:485: mnar med kyi 'khor lhag pa bcu drug yin te /
NK106(me)003:486: phyogs bzhin me ma mur gyi 'obs /
NK106(me)003:489: thal tshan gyi chu bo rab med dang bzhi bzhi yod pa'o //
NK106(me)003:490: de yang sngar mnar med kyi lcags khang du sdug
NK106(me)003:491: bsngal che drags pa de myong ba'i las bsrabs pa
NK106(me)003:492: dang phyogs bzhi'i sgo bye ba snyam pa las dmyal
NK106(me)003:493: ba pa dag so so nas phyir 'thon ma thag
NK106(me)003:494: /'obs bzang po grib ma can lta bu mthong nas
NK106(me)003:495: zhugs pas / mdag me 'bar ba'i nang du sha rus 'tshig pa'o //
NK106(me)003:496: de las thar pa snyam byed nas chu klung 'bab pa'i nang du zhugs pa lta bu las /
NK106(me)003:497: ro myags kyi 'dam srin bu lcags kyi mchu can la sogs pas 'bigs shing sdug bsngal ba'o //
NK106(me)003:498: de las 'thon nas thang nyams dga' bar phyin pa las /
NK106(me)003:499: spu grir song ste rkang pa bzhag pa na dum bur gshog /
NK106(me)003:501: de nas thar te nags tshal bzang po mthong sar
NK106(me)003:502: phyin pas ral grir song nas rlung gis bskyod pas
NK106(me)003:503: lus dum bur gcod cing sos pa'o //
NK106(me)003:504: de nas song ba las ri'i rtse nas lhan cig
NK106(me)003:505: 'dus pa'i skyes pa'am bud med de nyid rang la
NK106(me)003:507: lcags kyi thur mas lus 'bigs shing steng du sleb
NK106(me)003:508: dus kha dang bya rgod kyis klad pa 'bru la
NK106(me)003:509: / ri'i 'dab nas yang 'bod par mthong ste phyin pas thur mas gyen la 'bigs shing /
NK106(me)003:510: sngar gyi yul de la 'khyud pas lcags kyi skyes
NK106(me)003:511: pa'am bud med me 'bar bar song ste rab tu
NK106(me)003:512: 'khyud cing bsregs la za bar byed do //
NK106(me)003:513: de nas song ba na chu klung bzang po rgyang ma nas 'bab par mthong ste /
NK106(me)003:514: 'bog ma thag thal tshan sked nub tu tshud de sha rus tshig nas phyir bros pa las /
NK106(me)003:515: 'gram gnyis gshin rje'i skyes bus bsrung bar snang ba'o //
NK106(me)003:516: de lta bu'i sdug bsngal sngar yang mang du myong bas /
NK106(me)003:517: da ni de nas nges par dbyung bar bya dgos
NK106(me)003:518: snyam ste sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas nyams su
NK106(me)003:519: blang ngo // khrid rkang nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o //
NK106(me)003:520: de nas grang dmyal brgyad kyi sdug bsngal ni /
NK106(me)003:521: gangs ri dang kha ba dang chab rom gyi khrod /
NK106(me)003:522: bu yug langs pas sbrebs pa'i gnas na /
NK106(me)003:523: grang bas nyen pas lus la chu bur byung bas chu bur can dang /
NK106(me)003:524: chu bur rdol nas rmar song bas chu bur rdol ba dang /
NK106(me)003:525: so 'thams pas so tham tham pa dang /
NK106(me)003:526: a chu chu'i smre sngags 'don pas a chu zer ba dang /
NK106(me)003:527: kyi hud ces 'don pas kyi hud zer ba dang /
NK106(me)003:528: ut+pala ltar bzhi tshal du gas pas ut+pala ltar gas pa dang /
NK106(me)003:529: pad+ma ltar brgyad tshal du gas pas pad+ma ltar gas pa dang /
NK106(me)003:530: pad+ma chen po ltar bcu drug gam sum cu rtsa
NK106(me)003:531: gnyis su gas pas pad+ma chen po ltar gas pa'o
NK106(me)003:532: // de ltar gas pa'i rma nang du srog chags
NK106(me)003:533: phra mo zhugs nas za zhing grang ba'i sdug bsngal
NK106(me)003:534: mi bzad pa la spyod pa'i tshul la bsams te
NK106(me)003:535: // / da res de 'dra'i gnas su ma skyes
NK106(me)003:536: pa la dga' ba bsgoms te chos la 'bad dgos
NK106(me)003:537: snyam du sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas nyams su
NK106(me)003:538: // / blang ngo // khrid rkang nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o //
NK106(me)003:539: de nas nyi tshe ba'i sdug bsngal ni /
NK106(me)003:540: brag gi nang du bcar ba dang /
NK106(me)003:541: chab rom gyi nang du 'khyams shing rengs pa dang /
NK106(me)003:542: chu tshan gyi nang du 'tshod pa dang /
NK106(me)003:543: dgun chu grang ma'i nang du nyen pa dang /
NK106(me)003:544: me nang du tsha zhing bsreg pa dang /
NK106(me)003:545: shing sdong po'i gzugs la bcad gtubs byas pa na /
NK106(me)003:546: yan lag nying lag chad pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
NK106(me)003:551: sgyed po dang thag pa la sogs pa rtag tu
NK106(me)003:552: bkol zhing spyad pa'i gzugs su skyes nas las kyis
NK106(me)003:553: so so'i sdug bsngal bzod dka' ba myong ba dang
NK106(me)003:554: / lcags kyi khang par nyin mtshan cha re 'gyur
NK106(me)003:555: ba'i sdug bsngal la spyod pa la sogs pa ste
NK106(me)003:557: gangs dang chab rom la sogs pa mi yul dang
NK106(me)003:558: thun mong dang gzhan na sdug bsngal du mas nyen
NK106(me)003:560: de lta bur ma skyes pa zhig bya dgos snyam
NK106(me)003:561: du sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas nyams su blang
NK106(me)003:562: ngo // khriid rkang nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o //
NK106(me)003:563: de nas yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal ni /
NK106(me)003:564: phyi'i sgrib pa can lus rid cing yan lag phra ba /
NK106(me)003:565: bza' btung gi sgra mi thos shing rtag tu bkres skom gyis gdung ba /
NK106(me)003:566: gzhan gyis 'tshe zhing yid du mi 'ong ba rgya
NK106(me)003:567: mtsho dang nags 'dab la sogs pa mthong yang mthong
NK106(me)003:569: nang gi sgrib pa can ni glo snying nas me 'bar ba /
NK106(me)003:570: kha sna nas du ba 'thul ba'o //
NK106(me)003:571: sgo khud kyi sgrib pa can yi dgas re re'i lus la mang po gnas bcas te /
NK106(me)003:572: de'i khrag dang sha la za bar snang bas sdug bsngal ba'o //
NK106(me)003:573: de lta bu'i gnas su ma skyes pa zhig bya dgos snyam du /
NK106(me)003:574: sbyor dngos rjes gsum gyis nyams su blang ngo //
NK106(me)003:575: khrid rkang nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o //
NK106(me)003:576: de nas dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal ni /
NK106(me)003:577: byings na gnas pa rgya mtsho chen po dang /
NK106(me)003:578: gling bar gyi mun pa na chang dar ma'i sbang ma tsam yod de /
NK106(me)003:579: gcig gis gcig za zhing glan rmongs gti mug pa dang /
NK106(me)003:580: kha 'thor pa lha mi'i gnas na'ang bya dang ri dgas la sogs pa yod de /
NK106(me)003:585: 'tshe bas nyen pa la sogs pa sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa yod do //
NK106(me)003:586: de lta bur ma skyes pa zhig bya snyam du
NK106(me)003:587: sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas nyams su blang ngo
NK106(me)003:588: // khrid rkang nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o //
NK106(me)003:589: de nas mi'i sdug bsngal ni gsum dang brgyad kyis gdungs pa las /
NK106(me)003:590: sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal mdze thog tu phol byung ba lta bu dang /
NK106(me)003:591: na ba dang tsha ba dang mi 'dod pa'i rigs
NK106(me)003:592: gcig ma sangs par gcig brtsegs nas byung ba rnams
NK106(me)003:593: dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal bag ma blangs nas
NK106(me)003:594: bro brdungs pas khang pa rdib nas nyams nyes byung
NK106(me)003:595: dang / ba lta bu / da lta bde ba
NK106(me)003:596: nyid de ma thag sdug bsngal du 'gyur bas gdung
NK106(me)003:597: dang / ba lta bu / ba rnams dang /
NK106(me)003:598: 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dug zos pa'am gzhan la
NK106(me)003:599: gnod pa bskyal ba lta bu phyis sdug bsngal 'du
NK106(me)003:600: byed pas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bar byed
NK106(me)003:602: 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal las da res thar par
NK106(me)003:603: bya dgos snyam du sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas
NK106(me)003:606: de nas skye rgas na 'chi'i chu bo bzhi la bsam pa ni /
NK106(me)003:607: thog mar bar do dri za nye bar 'khor dang pha ma'i khu khrag gnyis 'dres pa la /
NK106(me)003:608: zhag bdun tshan bdun du mer mer po dang /
NK106(me)003:609: nur nur po la sogs las lus chags shing /
NK106(me)003:610: de nas gong du 'phel te ma'i lto ba na gnas dus /
NK106(me)003:614: mas zas gos spyod lam nyes pa kun la /
NK106(me)003:615: me'i 'obs na 'dug pa ltar res 'ga' ha cang tsha ba dang /
NK106(me)003:616: gangs dang chu'i nang du tshud pa ltar grang ba dang /
NK106(me)003:617: ris non par ltar lji ba dang /
NK106(me)003:618: g.yang la bskyur ba ltar nyam nga ba dang /
NK106(me)003:619: mgo mjug ldog nas sprugs pa ltar shin tu sdug bsngal ba /
NK106(me)003:620: btsa' dus bsdus 'joms kyi dmyal ba ltar dar cig brgyal ba dang /
NK106(me)003:621: lag pas reg dus sha bur spu gris reg pa ltar mi bzod pa dang /
NK106(me)003:622: khrus byas pa na pags pa bshu ba ltar tsha
NK106(me)003:623: ba la sogs pa sdug bsngal dpag tu med do
NK106(me)003:624: // de'i phyir gang du skyes kyang sdug bsngal las ma 'das pas /
NK106(me)003:625: skye ba'i 'khor ba zad pa zhig da res bya
NK106(me)003:626: dgos snyam pas sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas nyams
NK106(me)003:627: su blang ngo // khrid rkang so gcig pa'o //
NK106(me)003:628: de nas rgas pa'i sdug bsngal ni /
NK106(me)003:629: lus kyi stobs shor bas ldang 'dug dang sgul skyod dka'/
NK106(me)003:630: dbang po'i mdangs nyams pas mig 'grib /
NK106(me)003:633: shes pa'i rtsal shor bas blo'i spro zhi zhing sems kyi khongs chud /
NK106(me)003:634: rtsa rlung gi 'phel bri bas byis pa bzhin col chung la tshor ba rags /
NK106(me)003:635: nang gi lus sems 'gyur bas nad dang 'tshe ba mang zhing kun gyi yid du mi 'ong /
NK106(me)003:636: ngag tu 'chi ba la smon yang don la shi
NK106(me)003:637: yis dogs pa la sogs pa sdug bsngal dpag tu
NK106(me)003:638: med do // de phyir rga shi med pa'i byang
NK106(me)003:639: chub cig da res 'grub par bya dgos snyam du
NK106(me)003:640: sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas nyams su blang ngo
NK106(me)003:641: med do // // khrid rkang so gnyis pa'o //
NK106(me)003:642: de nas na ba'i sdug bsngal la bsams te /
NK106(me)003:643: 'byung bzhi'i 'du ba 'khrugs pas zug gzer gyi tshor ba rags /
NK106(me)003:644: lus kyi rang bzhin 'gyur 'tshig cing yid mi bde /
NK106(me)003:645: dbang po'i stobs nyams pas mal nas ldang 'dug dka'/
NK106(me)003:646: gang yang yid du mi 'ong bas rtag tu 'du shes 'khrugs /
NK106(me)003:647: gdon bgegs bar chad langs pas glo bur ye 'drog che /
NK106(me)003:648: da res shi yis dogs pa'i sems kyi sdug bsngal che ba la sogs pa ste /
NK106(me)003:649: shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i rang bzhin la bsams te /
NK106(me)003:650: da res zug rngu thams cad las grol ba'i bdud
NK106(me)003:651: rtsi thob par bya dgos snyam du sbyor dngos rjes
NK106(me)003:652: gsum tshang bas nyams su blang ngo //
NK106(me)003:654: de nas 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal ni /
NK106(me)003:656: zas gos kyi tha mal spyod /
NK106(me)003:658: 'khor 'das dang nye du 'brel pa mang pos bskor kyang phan pa ni cung zad med /
NK106(me)003:665: thams cad bor nas gcig pur mar gyi gseb nas spu don pa ltar 'gro ba'i dus na /
NK106(me)003:666: zas nor ji tsam yod kyang zan chang cig khyer ba'i dbang yang med /
NK106(me)003:667: 'khor dang nye du ji tsam yod kyang mi gcig
NK106(me)003:668: dang 'grogs dbang yang med par 'gro dgos pa 'di
NK106(me)003:669: mtshang re che / da res song nas ni phyir mi ldog /
NK106(me)003:670: de la de snga phan chad tshe 'di'i snang ba dgra 'dul /
NK106(me)003:672: gnas dang yo byad kyi phyi chis /
NK106(me)003:673: bu tsha 'khor 'dab kyi sha tsha byas pa la
NK106(me)003:674: don ci yod snyam du 'chi med thar pa'i lam
NK106(me)003:675: mchog bsgrub pa la sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas
NK106(me)003:678: de nas mi sdug pa dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal ni /
NK106(me)003:679: mi 'dod pa'i mi dang 'tshe dogs byung ba ste /
NK106(me)003:680: mi 'dod bzhin du sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba dang /
NK106(me)003:681: sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal ni /
NK106(me)003:682: gnyen dang mdza' bshes shi ba dang /
NK106(me)003:683: yul thag ring por song ba'i rjes lta bu ste /
NK106(me)003:684: de'i yon tan lus ngag gi rnam 'gyur dran pa'i
NK106(me)003:685: mod yid gdung zhing mngon par mi dga' ba dang
NK106(me)003:686: / dngos po bzang dgu nyams pa dang /
NK106(me)003:687: bsod nams 'gribs pa la sogs pa ste /
NK106(me)003:688: gang yid du 'thad pa bral bas mya ngan skye ba dang /
NK106(me)003:693: rnam par shes pa ste rang gi nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di yang /
NK106(me)003:694: sdug bsngal gyi gnas dang rten dang 'byung khungs su gyur pas sdug bsngal te /
NK106(me)003:695: dper na tsher ma zhig zug na'ang /
NK106(me)003:696: gzugs la na tsha'i zug rngu /
NK106(me)003:697: tshor ba sems kyi de nyid zug tu shes pa /
NK106(me)003:698: na tsha de nyid skad cig 'brel chags su 'du shes pa /
NK106(me)003:699: yang na bar byed 'du byed pa /
NK106(me)003:700: tsher ma'i zug gi rnam par shes par te /
NK106(me)003:701: lus la na tsha sems la sdug bsngal ci byung
NK106(me)003:702: yang phung po lnga po 'di'i steng du ma gtogs
NK106(me)003:703: pa gzhan du mi 'byung ba'i phyir /
NK106(me)003:704: de ni sdug bsngal bden pa'i cha shas nyer len
NK106(me)003:705: zag bcas kyi phung po rnams dang mi ldan pa
NK106(me)003:706: 'phags pa'i ye shes shig cis kyang thob par bya
NK106(me)003:707: dgos snyam du sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas nyams
NK106(me)003:708: su blang ngo // khrid rkang so lnga pa'o //
NK106(me)003:709: de nas lha ma yin gyi sdug bsngal ni /
NK106(me)003:710: lha'i dpal la mi bzod pas rtag tu phrag dog cing /
NK106(me)003:711: g.yul 'gyed pas shin tu gdung ba dang /
NK106(me)003:712: rang rang gi gnas ris gcod cing 'tshe bas lus
NK106(me)003:713: sems 'khrugs pa'i zug rngu chen po kha smras dang
NK106(me)003:714: 'thab rtsod rdo ba lta bus rgyun du gdung ba'i
NK106(me)003:715: phyir / da res zhi ba dam pa'i chos sgrub
NK106(me)003:716: dgos snyam du sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas nyams
NK106(me)003:717: phyir / su blang ngo // khrid rkang so drug pa'o //
NK106(me)003:718: de nas lha'i sdug bsngal ni /
NK106(me)003:719: 'dod lha'i gnas na dar cig bde yang 'chi 'pho ba'i tshe sngon gyi las dge ba zad /
NK106(me)003:720: mi dge ba'i 'bras bu ngan 'gror skye ba mngon shes kyis shes pas /
NK106(me)003:721: nya bye tshan la bsgres pa bas che ba'i sdug
NK106(me)003:722: bsngal drag po lha'i zhag bdun myong dgos pa dang
NK106(me)003:723: / gzugs dang gzugs med na ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba la dar cig spyod kyang /
NK106(me)003:725: ngan pa'i stobs kyis srid pa 'og mar ltung ba'i sdug bsngal 'du byed pas /
NK106(me)003:726: phung po nying mtshams sbyor ba 'gyur ba dang /
NK106(me)003:727: 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal la spyod pa'i phyir /
NK106(me)003:728: da res khams gsum rigs drug nas cis kyang thar
NK106(me)003:729: pa zhig bya dgos snyam du sbyor dngos rjes gsum
NK106(me)003:732: de nas da lta'i tshul la dpag pa ni /
NK106(me)003:733: 'di ltar da res rten dal 'byor gyi mi lus thob cing rang dbang rang la yod dus 'dir /
NK106(me)003:734: lus la me stag phog pa tsam gyis sdug bsngal yang mi bzod /
NK106(me)003:735: cung zad gang ba bkres skom ngal dub kyi sdug bsngal phra mo yang mi bzod na /
NK106(me)003:736: shi nas dmyal ba tsha grang /
NK106(me)003:738: dud 'gro bkol spyod la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal drag la rgyun ring ba bzod par ji ltar nus /
NK106(me)003:739: da lta nyin re'i nad dang sdug bsngal yang mi bzod na /
NK106(me)003:740: 'khor ba mtha' med kyi sdug bsngal ji ltar bzod
NK106(me)003:741: snyam du sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas nyams su
NK106(me)003:742: blang ngo // khrid rkang so brgyad pa'o //
NK106(me)003:743: don bzhi pa las rgyu 'bras bsam pa la /
NK106(me)003:746: thams cad las kyi rang bzhin du bsam pa gsum las /
NK106(me)003:747: dang po mi dge ba'i las bcu'i lus kyi las gsum ni /
NK106(me)003:748: srog bcad pas gang du skyes pa der tshe thung zhing nad mang la /
NK106(me)003:749: yul yang nyams mi dga' ba'i ngam grog dang g.yang
NK106(me)003:750: sa la sogs pa tshe la bar du gcod par
NK106(me)003:751: gnas pa dang / ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal myong ba la sogs pa'o //
NK106(me)003:752: ma byin par blangs pas dbul zhing phongs la sad
NK106(me)003:753: ser mu ges nyen pa'i yul ngan par gnas pa
NK106(me)003:754: dang / ngan song gsum las khyad par yi dgas kyi yul du skye ba la sogs pa'o //
NK106(me)003:755: log par g.yem pas khyim thab mi mdzes la dgra zla dang bcas shing /
NK106(me)003:756: tsha sgo dang yongs su dri nga la btsog pa'i yul du gnas pa dang /
NK106(me)003:757: ngan song gi sdug bsngal myong bar byed pa'i phyir /
NK106(me)003:758: bdag gis deng nas lus kyi mi dge ba gsum
NK106(me)003:759: po spang dgos snyam du sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang
NK106(me)003:762: de nas ngag gi bzhi ni /
NK106(me)003:763: rdzun gyis skur pa mang zhing rtag tu gzhan gyis bslu ba dang /
NK106(me)003:764: phra mas 'khor 'dab mi mdza' zhing phan btags pa'ang dgrar ldang ba dang /
NK106(me)003:765: tshig rtsub mos mi snyan pa 'ba' zhig rna bar thos shing 'thab mo'i tshig tu 'gyur ba dang /
NK106(me)003:766: ngag 'khyal bas tshig mi btsun zhing 'chol ba ste /
NK106(me)003:767: ngan 'gro log par ltung ba'i gnas su brgyud cing sdug bsngal myong bar nges pas /
NK106(me)003:768: bdag gis spang dgos snyam du sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas nyams su blang ngo //
NK106(me)003:770: de nas yid kyi gsum ni brnab sems kyis gang
NK106(me)003:771: bsam pa mi 'grub cing ma bsams pa thog tu
NK106(me)003:772: 'bab pa dang / gnod sems kyis rtag tu 'jigs shing 'tshe dogs mang la nyam nga ba dang /
NK106(me)003:773: log ltas lta ba ngan pa rgyu 'bras med pa
NK106(me)003:774: dang rtag chad kyi lus ngan pa la gnas te
NK106(me)003:775: / ngan 'gror 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gdung ba'i phyir /
NK106(me)003:776: bdag gis spang bar bya'o snyam du sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas nyams su blang ngo //
NK106(me)003:778: de nas dge ba'i las la /
NK106(me)003:780: thar pa cha mthun gyi las gnyis las /
NK106(me)003:782: dge ba bcu'i lus kyi las gsum ni /
NK106(me)003:783: srog gcod pa spangs pas tshe ring zhing nad med pa dang /
NK106(me)003:784: ma byin par len pa spangs pas longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang /
NK106(me)003:785: 'dod log spangs pas mthun pa'i khyim thab mdzes shing dgra zla med pa ste /
NK106(me)003:786: bde 'gro yid du 'ong ba'i bde ba thob pa'i phyir /
NK106(me)003:787: bdag gis rgyud la brten dgos snyam du sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas nyams su blang ngo //
NK106(me)003:789: de nas ngag gi bzhi ni /
NK106(me)003:790: rdzun spangs pas kun gyis bstod cing dga' bar byed pa dang /
NK106(me)003:791: phra ma spangs pas 'khor g.yog mthun zhing mchog tu gus pa dang /
NK106(me)003:792: tshig rtsub spangs pas rna bar snyan cing bstod pa dang /
NK106(me)003:793: ngag 'khyal spangs pas tshig bzung bar 'os shing tshad mar byed pa ste /
NK106(me)003:794: ngag gi dge ba dang bde ba thams cad 'grub pas /
NK106(me)003:795: bdag gis brten par bya'o snyam du sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas nyams su blang ngo //
NK106(me)003:797: de nas yid kyi las gsum ni /
NK106(me)003:798: brnab sems spangs pas re ba 'grub pa dang /
NK106(me)003:799: gnod sems spangs pas 'tshe ba med pa dang /
NK106(me)003:800: log lta spangs pas lta ba bzang por 'gyur zhing /
NK106(me)003:801: yid kyi dge ba dang legs pas mtho ris kyi dga' bde 'grub pa'i phyir /
NK106(me)003:802: bdag gis nyams su blang bar bya dgos snyam du
NK106(me)003:803: sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas nyams su blang ngo
NK106(me)003:805: de nas thar pa cha mthun gyi las ni /
NK106(me)003:806: dge ba gang byed kyang 'khor ba las thar nas
NK106(me)003:807: zhi ba mya ngan las 'das na thob par bya
NK106(me)003:811: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thar pa gsum la ltos nas gsum du yod kyang /
NK106(me)003:812: da res rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'dod pas dge ba bcu dang /
NK106(me)003:817: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sogs pa thams cad la /
NK106(me)003:819: dngos po bden zhen gyi dmigs pa med pa /
NK106(me)003:820: rjes bsngo ba gsum gyis zin par byas la skad cig kyang ma dal bar sgrub dgos /
NK106(me)003:821: tshogs ma rdzogs na sangs rgyas mi thob pa'i phyir
NK106(me)003:822: snyam du sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas nyams su
NK106(me)003:823: blang ngo // khrid rkang zhe lnga pa'o //
NK106(me)003:824: de nas thams cad las kyi rang bzhin du bsam pa ni /
NK106(me)003:825: 'di ltar 'khor ba'i bde sdug dang mtho dman thams
NK106(me)003:826: cad kyang rang rang gi las dge sdig gis byas
NK106(me)003:827: pa yin la / byang chub gsum dang de'i bde
NK106(me)003:828: legs tha dad pa'ang thar pa cha mthun gyi las
NK106(me)003:829: khyad par can so sos byas pa'i phyir /
NK106(me)003:830: las 'di ni ri mo mkhan dang 'dra ba /
NK106(me)003:831: gcig gis mang po'i rnam par bsgyur ba /
NK106(me)003:832: rjes su 'gro bas lus kyi grib ma dang 'dra ba /
NK106(me)003:833: rang gis byas pa gzhan la mi 'pho /
NK106(me)003:834: gzhan gyi las rang la mi 'pho bas lus tha dad kyi bde sdug lta bu /
NK106(me)003:835: dge sdig gi shugs drags pas mtho ris dang ngan
NK106(me)003:836: 'gror 'phen pa rgyal po dbang po che lta bu
NK106(me)003:837: / rgya ni rgya che bas nam mkha'i dbyings lta bu /
NK106(me)003:838: rnam pa grangs mang bas tshong dus kyi zong lta bu /
NK106(me)003:839: phan tshun gcig tu mi 'dre bas za 'og gi ber khyim lta bu /
NK106(me)003:840: dkar nag ngo bo mi 'gyur bas ut+pala dang ku mu ta lta bu ste /
NK106(me)003:841: gang ci bsags pa de dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu
NK106(me)003:842: re 'byin par byed pa'i phyir bdag gis thams cad
NK106(me)003:843: las su shes par byas las blang dor brtson par
NK106(me)003:844: bya dgos snyam du sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas
NK106(me)003:847: don lnga pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten par gdams pa las /
NK106(me)003:848: rang bzhin bsam pa dang rnal 'byor bsgom pa gnyis las /
NK106(me)003:849: dang po la'ang khyad par bsam pa /
NK106(me)003:851: yon tan basngagasa pa dang gsum las /
NK106(me)003:852: dam pa dang dam pa ma yin pa'i khyad par blang dor du bya ba ni /
NK106(me)003:853: yang dag pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten na de'i
NK106(me)003:854: yon tan dge ba dang legs pa ngang gis 'go
NK106(me)003:855: ba ni tsan+dana gyi shing drung du 'khod nas spos
NK106(me)003:856: dri zhim po'i ngad 'go ba lta bu'o //
NK106(me)003:857: de yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang dge ba'i grogs po bsten par bya ste /
NK106(me)003:858: bdag gi dge ba gong nas gong du 'phel zhing rgyas par byed pa'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)003:859: mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen ngan pa dang sdig pa'i
NK106(me)003:860: grogs la brten na de'i skyon ngang gis 'go ba
NK106(me)003:861: ni / mi gtsang ba'i khrod du ku sha nya rul gyis bsgos pa lta bu'o //
NK106(me)003:862: de'i phyir bdag gis sdig pa'i bshes gnyen sdig grogs dang bcas pa spang dgos te /
NK106(me)003:863: mi dge ba'i phyogs dag bsrabs shing spangs nas med
NK106(me)003:864: par bya dgos pa'i phyir ro snyam du sbyor dngos
NK106(me)003:865: rjes gsum gyis nyams su blang ngo //
NK106(me)003:867: de nas mtshan nyid brtag pa la gnyis las /
NK106(me)003:868: thun mong gi mtshan nyid ni /
NK106(me)003:869: nor bu'i gling du 'khrid pa ded dpon mkhas pa'i
NK106(me)003:870: rang bzhin can la rag las pa ltar bdag gis
NK106(me)003:871: thar pa'i gling du phyin nas sangs rgyas thob pa'ang
NK106(me)003:872: bla ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag las pas
NK106(me)003:873: / sku gsung thugs kyi spyod pa skyon med cing yon tan phun sum tshogs pas brgyan la /
NK106(me)003:874: thos pa dang snying rje che ba /
NK106(me)003:875: tshad med pa'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rje mnga' ba /
NK106(me)003:876: 'brel tshad thar pa'i lam la 'god pa /
NK106(me)003:877: skyo dub dang dka' spyad bzod pa zhig la brten par bya /
NK106(me)003:878: de lta bu'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang myur du 'phrad cing thugs rjes 'dzin par shog cig /
NK106(me)003:879: rtag tu mi 'bral bar gyur cig snyam du sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas nyams su blang ngo //
NK106(me)003:881: de nas thun mong ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid ni /
NK106(me)003:882: tshe 'dir dngos mnga' ris dang dbang phyug phun sum
NK106(me)003:883: tshogs pa sbyin pa 'khor los sgyur ba la sogs
NK106(me)003:884: pa rgyal po bzang po la rag las pa ltar
NK106(me)003:885: / bdag gis kyang tshe gcig gi bla na med
NK106(me)003:886: pa'i 'bras bu dang yon tan thob pa bla ma
NK106(me)003:887: rdo rje 'dzin pa mkhas grub dam pa la rag
NK106(me)003:888: / las pas / bla ma dam pa dbang dang dam tshig phun sum tshogs pa /
NK106(me)003:889: rgyud dang man ngag gi gnas la mkhas pa /
NK106(me)003:890: bsnyen sgrub zab mo'i nus pa thob pa /
NK106(me)003:891: lta dgongs ting nge 'dzin gyi gding tshad mnga' ba /
NK106(me)003:892: gzhan don phrin las phun sum tshogs pa zhig la brten par bya dgos /
NK106(me)003:893: de lta bu'i bla ma dam pa rnams dang ma mjal ba mjal bar shog cig /
NK106(me)003:894: mjal zin rnams dang mi 'bral bar shog cig /
NK106(me)003:895: rtag tu mnyes shing thugs rjes 'dzin par shog cig
NK106(me)003:896: snyam du sbyor dngos rjes gsum gyis nyams su blang
NK106(me)003:897: ngo // khrid rkang zhe dgu pa'o //
NK106(me)003:898: de nas yon tan basngagasa pa la rim pa gsum las /
NK106(me)003:900: 'jig rten na u dum w+aa ra'i me tog 'byung ba dka' ba ltar sangs rgyas 'byung dka'/
NK106(me)003:901: de'i thugs rje las sprul pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa'ang 'byung dka' ste /
NK106(me)003:902: da res bdag cag gi dpal mgon bla ma dam
NK106(me)003:903: pa 'dis mtshon nas yang dag pa dge ba'i bshes
NK106(me)003:904: gnyen rnams la yon tan tshad med pa'i 'od zer
NK106(me)003:905: mnga' bas ni / srid pa'i rgya mtsho sgrol bas gru chen mnyen pa lta bu /
NK106(me)003:906: thar pa'i lam sna 'dren pas ded dpon mkhas pa lta bu /
NK106(me)003:907: srid zhi'i rgud pa sel bas yid bzhin nor bu lta bu /
NK106(me)003:908: nyon mongs me dpung 'jil bas bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun lta bu /
NK106(me)003:909: chos kyi char chen 'bebs pas char sprin bzang po lta bu /
NK106(me)003:910: 'gro kun dga' ba bskyed pas lha'i rnga sgra lta bu /
NK106(me)003:911: dug gsum nad kun sel bas sman pa'i rgyal po lta bu /
NK106(me)003:912: ma rig mun pa sel bas nyi zla sgron me lta bu /
NK106(me)003:913: 'dod dgu'i re ba 'byung bas dpag bsam shing chen lta bu /
NK106(me)003:914: phrin las 'od stong mnga' bas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
NK106(me)003:915: lta bu'i yon tan mnga' ba ste ngo mtshar to
NK106(me)003:916: // deng sang bdag lta bus mjal zhing bsten du yod pa la spro dga' mchog tu skye nas /
NK106(me)003:917: tshe rabs nas tshe rabs thams cad du yang dag
NK106(me)003:918: pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten zhing thugs rjes
NK106(me)003:920: bdag kyang nam zhig na de kho na 'dra bar
NK106(me)003:921: thob par shog cig snyam du sbyor dngos rjes gsum
NK106(me)003:924: de nas rim pa gnyis pa ni /
NK106(me)003:925: 'di ltar bla ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa rnams kyis dgongs pa nam mkha' ltar rgya che /
NK106(me)003:927: mkhyen rab rgya mtsho ltar tshad med /
NK106(me)003:928: thugs rje chu klung ltar shugs drag /
NK106(me)003:929: rang bzhin ri rgyal ltar thugs brtan /
NK106(me)003:930: skyon bral pad+ma ltar rnam dag 'gro la pha ma ltar thugs snyoms /
NK106(me)003:931: yon tan gter mdzod ltar lhun grub /
NK106(me)003:932: 'jig rten rgyal ba ltar yongs su 'dren pa'i rang bzhin dam pa ste /
NK106(me)003:933: yon tan re re'i cha yang dpag gis mi langs pas ngo mtshar /
NK106(me)003:934: rtag tu dgyes shing thugs rjes 'dzin par shog cig
NK106(me)003:935: snyam du sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas nyams su
NK106(me)003:936: blang ngo // khrid rkang nga gcig pa'o //
NK106(me)003:937: de nas rim pa gsum pa ni /
NK106(me)003:938: 'di ltar dpal mgon bla ma dam pa rnams ni
NK106(me)003:939: mthong ba dang thos pa dang dran pa dang reg
NK106(me)003:940: pa tsam gyis thar pa'i sa bon 'debs shing 'khor
NK106(me)003:941: ba phyir bsnyil bas sangs rgyas kun dang phrin las
NK106(me)003:942: kyi byed pa gcig pa dang /
NK106(me)003:943: thar pa'i lam du 'dren pas skal ba mchog tu gyur pa dang /
NK106(me)003:944: dkyil 'khor gang du he ru ka'i ngo bor dbang
NK106(me)003:945: rdzogs thams cad kyi bya ba byed pas dkon mchog
NK106(me)003:947: gdul ngor sangs rgyas las kyang bka' drin mchog tu che ba'i yon tan mnga' ba ste /
NK106(me)003:948: tshe 'dir smin grol zab mo'i lam la 'god pa'i
NK106(me)003:949: ngang can rnams la tshe rabs thams cad du bsten
NK106(me)003:950: cing mnyes nas thugs rjes byin gyis rlobs par shog
NK106(me)003:951: cig snyam du sbyor dngos rjes gsum gyis nyams su
NK106(me)003:952: blang ngo // khrid rkang nga gnyis pa'o //
NK106(me)003:953: de nas rnal 'byor bsgom pa la gsum las /
NK106(me)003:958: nyin mo spyi gtsug mtshan mo snying nang du pad+ma nyi zla'i steng du rtsa ba'i bla ma la /
NK106(me)003:959: yi dam mkha' 'gro dang bcas pas bskor bar bsams la /
NK106(me)003:960: rtsa ba dang brgyud pa'i bla ma mkha' 'gro dang bcas pa spyan drangs la thim pa la /
NK106(me)003:964: gsol ba gdab pa rnams bya ste /
NK106(me)003:965: na mo bla ma yi dam dang //
NK106(me)003:967: phyi nang gsang gsum mchod pa 'bul //
NK106(me)003:968: rtsa ba yan lag nyams chag bshags //
NK106(me)003:969: smin grol dbang dang byin rlabs stsol //
NK106(me)003:970: tshe rabs 'dren ston mdzad du gsol //
NK106(me)003:972: sku'i cha shas nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun bab /
NK106(me)003:975: bde chen chos nyid kyi rtogs pa skyes par bsams la dar cig mnyam par bzhag nas /
NK106(me)003:976: bla ma gang yin gyi mtshan de shes pa rgya
NK106(me)003:977: skad du bsgyur la +aahmh'u gi sgrom nas bzlas so
NK106(me)003:978: // gu ru ku m+aa r+aa tsa sid+d+hi +aahmh'u zhes pa lta bu'o //
NK106(me)003:979: de nas bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i sku las
NK106(me)003:980: 'od dang bdud rtsi'i rgyun babs pas lus kyi sgrib
NK106(me)003:981: pa sbyangs / bum pa'i dbang thob /
NK106(me)003:982: sku rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs /
NK106(me)003:983: gsung las ngag gi dri ma sbyangs /
NK106(me)003:985: gsung rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs /
NK106(me)003:986: thugs ka nas 'od dang bdud rtsis yid kyi sgrib pa sbyangs /
NK106(me)003:987: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang thob /
NK106(me)003:988: thugs rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs /
NK106(me)003:989: thams cad las 'od dang bdud rtsis lus ngag yid gsum tha dad du 'dzin pa'i dri ma sbyangs /
NK106(me)003:990: tshig dbang rin po che thob /
NK106(me)003:991: ye shes rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs /
NK106(me)003:992: bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum bla ma'i sku gsung thugs la thim /
NK106(me)003:993: de nyid chos sku skye ba med pa'i ngang la thim pas /
NK106(me)003:994: gang yang yid la mi byed pa'i ngang la bzhag nas bsngo ba bya'o //
NK106(me)003:996: de nas las tshogs kyi rim pa ni /
NK106(me)003:997: zhi ba la de thams cad dkar por bsams pa'i
NK106(me)003:998: 'od zer dkar pos nad gdon sdig sgrib zhi bar
NK106(me)003:999: bsams la / sngags kyi sham bur sh+aan+tim ku ru ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK106(me)003:1001: rgyas pa la thams cad ser por bsams pa'i 'od
NK106(me)003:1002: zer gyis tshe dang bsod nams dang 'byor pa rgyas
NK106(me)003:1003: par bsams la / push+tim ku ru ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK106(me)003:1005: dbang la thams cad dmar por 'phro bas bsgrub bya dbang du byas par bsams la /
NK106(me)003:1006: che ge mo wa sham ku ru ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK106(me)003:1008: drag po la thams cad mthing nag me'i 'od zer
NK106(me)003:1009: dang tsha tsha 'phro bas gdon bgegs tshar bcad par
NK106(me)003:1010: bsams la / gdon bgegs m+aa ra ya phata /
NK106(me)003:1012: dmigs pa gzhan rnams sngar dang  'dra'o //
NK106(me)003:1014: de nas nad gdon 'chi bslu'i tshe /
NK106(me)003:1015: skyabs su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed nas /
NK106(me)003:1017: mdun gyi nam mkhar pad sdong seng ge rin po
NK106(me)003:1018: che'i khri rkang gis bteg pa'i steng du nyi zla
NK106(me)003:1019: dar 'bol brtsegs pa'i steng du rtsa ba'i bla ma
NK106(me)003:1020: la / brgyud pa'i bla ma sangs rgyas dang dbyer med du bsams pa'i mthar /
NK106(me)003:1021: yi dam dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs mkha' 'gro dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs dang /
NK106(me)003:1022: 'og tu rigs drug gnod byed dang bcas pa bsams la /
NK106(me)003:1023: de nas rang gi snying nang nas rnam shes h'u
NK106(me)003:1024: gi rnam pa tshangs bug nas thon pas dpa' bo
NK106(me)003:1025: rigs lnga'i mkha' 'gro chu gri thogs par gyur pa
NK106(me)003:1026: des / rang gi thod pa smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur bcad nas /
NK106(me)003:1027: thod pa'i sgyed po ri rab tsam pa gsum gyi
NK106(me)003:1028: steng du bzhag pa'i nang du lus kyi sha khrag
NK106(me)003:1029: blugs te / 'og nas me 'bar bas khol ba la /
NK106(me)003:1030: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bdud rtsi byung bas khengs te /
NK106(me)003:1031: ci 'dod pa'i bza' btung dang bdud rtsi bzang por gyur pa de /
NK106(me)003:1032: dpa' bo thod pa thogs pa grangs med pa lag
NK106(me)003:1033: bde'i tshul du sprul pas mgron rnams so so'i spyan
NK106(me)003:1034: sngar dus mnyam du drangs pas /
NK106(me)003:1035: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mgron rnams mnyes te tshogs
NK106(me)003:1036: gnyis rdzogs nas mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub
NK106(me)003:1037: thob / 'khor ba'i mgron rnams mnyes te thog ma med pa'i lan chags khyer zhing bu lon sbyangs /
NK106(me)003:1038: khyad par du gnod byed kyi bgegs rigs mnyes pas gdug sems dang bar chad zhi /
NK106(me)003:1039: thams cad mnyes pa'i 'od zer rang la phog pas
NK106(me)003:1040: nad zhi gdod zhi 'chi ba bslus shing dngos grub
NK106(me)003:1042: de thams cad nam mkha' la sprin dengs pa ltar
NK106(me)003:1043: ci yang mi dmigs pa'i ngang la bsngo ba bya'o
NK106(me)003:1044: // 'dis ni tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa dang /
NK106(me)003:1047: bar do'i 'od gsal zin par byed pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1049: don drug pa skyabs su 'gro ba la /
NK106(me)003:1052: skyabs su 'gro tshul dang gsum las /
NK106(me)003:1054: 'di ltar ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal la 'jigs
NK106(me)003:1055: nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi bde ba don du
NK106(me)003:1056: gnyer ba'i phyir / dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro na skyes bu chung ngu zhes bya ste /
NK106(me)003:1057: 'bras bu gnas skabs kyi bde ba tsam don du gnyer ba las gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)003:1058: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las skrag nas rang nyid gcig
NK106(me)003:1059: pu zhi bde don du gnyer ba'i phyir dkon mchog
NK106(me)003:1060: gsum la skyabs su 'gro na skyes bu 'bring po
NK106(me)003:1061: zhes bya ste / 'khor ba las rang nyid tsam thar pa'i 'bras bu la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)003:1062: mtha' med par 'khor ba'i sems can gzhan rnams kyis sdug bsngal mthong nas /
NK106(me)003:1063: de rnams 'khor ba las bsgral ba'i phyir dkon mchog
NK106(me)003:1064: gsum la skyabs su 'gro na skyes bu chen po
NK106(me)003:1065: zhes bya ste / sems can thams cad kyi don
NK106(me)003:1066: du sangs rgyas 'dod pa la dmigs pa'i phyir ro
NK106(me)003:1067: zhes bya ste / // de'i phyir bdag gis skyes bu chung ngu dang /
NK106(me)003:1068: 'bring gi cha las log ste sems can thams cad
NK106(me)003:1069: kyi don du skyes bu chen po'i rjes su bslab
NK106(me)003:1070: par bya'o snyam pa sbyor dngos rjes gsum gyis nyams
NK106(me)003:1071: su blang ngo // khrid rkang nga drug pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1072: de nas phan yon bsam pa ni /
NK106(me)003:1073: 'di ltar rang nyid 'khor ba na 'khor ba /
NK106(me)003:1074: 'jig rten pa'i lha la yang skyabs su 'gro na /
NK106(me)003:1075: 'jig med thar pa'i mchog la gnas pa dkon mchog gsum la ci'i phyir skyabs su mi 'gro /
NK106(me)003:1076: brtan par dka' zhing gnod pa sbyin pa'i rang bzhin
NK106(me)003:1077: rgyal po la sogs pa yang mgon dang skyabs su
NK106(me)003:1078: mi 'gro / gang gi skyabs su song ba tsam gyis thar pa'i sa bon 'debs pa dang /
NK106(me)003:1079: mi dge'i tshogs las ring du byed cing dge ba gong du 'phel ba dang /
NK106(me)003:1080: sdom pa kun gyi rten du rung zhing yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa dang /
NK106(me)003:1081: 'dir yang dkar phyogs kyi lha rnams kyis bsrung zhing
NK106(me)003:1082: smon pa'i re ba yid bzhin du 'grub pa dang
NK106(me)003:1083: / rtag tu tshe rabs dran cing dkon mchog gsum gyi snang ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /
NK106(me)003:1084: 'di phyir bde zhing mthar thug sangs rgyas kyi go
NK106(me)003:1085: 'phang thob pa la sogs pa dpag tu med pa
NK106(me)003:1086: la bsams te sbyor dngos rjes gsum gyis nyams su
NK106(me)003:1087: blang ngo // khrid rkang nga bdun pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1088: de nas skyabs su 'gro tshul ni /
NK106(me)003:1089: skyabs su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed nas /
NK106(me)003:1090: mdun gyi nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du gdan seng ge
NK106(me)003:1091: dang pad+ma nyi zla rin po che'i steng du bla
NK106(me)003:1092: ma dang sangs rgyas dbyer med du bzhugs pa la
NK106(me)003:1093: / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang mkha' 'gro dam
NK106(me)003:1094: can rgya mtsho'i tshogs kyis bskor bas nam mkha' khyab
NK106(me)003:1095: / par bsams la / bdag dang sems can thams cad sa gzhi'i ngos nas thal mo sbyar te /
NK106(me)003:1096: dus 'di nas byang chub snying po'i bar du khyed la 'bul /
NK106(me)003:1098: khyed ma gtogs pa re ba'i gnas dang skyabs gzhan med ces bsam zhing gdangs snyan pos /
NK106(me)003:1099: bla ma la skyabs su mchi'o //
NK106(me)003:1100: sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o //
NK106(me)003:1103: zhes ci 'grub tu brjod pa'i rjes su /
NK106(me)003:1104: bdag dang sems can thams cad dkon mchog gsum la thim /
NK106(me)003:1105: de yang dbus kyi bla ma sangs rgyas rin po che la thim /
NK106(me)003:1106: de yang chos sku spros bral stong pa'i ngang du thim pas /
NK106(me)003:1107: gang lang dmigs su med pa'i ngang la glod nas ji tsam blo gnas kyi bar du bsgom /
NK106(me)003:1109: 'di ni chos thams cad kyi gzhi ma ste gal po che yin pas nan tan du bya'o //
NK106(me)003:1111: don bdun pa tshad med bzhi'i bsgom tshul la gsum ste /
NK106(me)003:1112: phan yon la bsam ste bsgom pa la spro dga' bskyed la /
NK106(me)003:1116: 'di ltar tshad med bzhi ma bsgoms na sangs rgyas su mi 'grub cing /
NK106(me)003:1117: bsgoms na 'grub pas kyang bsgom dgongs la /
NK106(me)003:1118: byams pas ni gnas skabs kun gyi yid du 'ong zhing mthar thug longs sku 'grub pa dang /
NK106(me)003:1119: snying rjes 'tshe ba med cing chos sku 'grub pa dang /
NK106(me)003:1120: dga' bas phrag dog med cing sprul sku 'grub pa dang /
NK106(me)003:1121: btang snyoms kyis sems las su rung zhing ngo bo nyid kyi sku 'grub pa dang /
NK106(me)003:1122: gzhan yang 'dod par lha mi'i lus 'grub pas phan bde byed la /
NK106(me)003:1123: gzugs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang skye gnas dag pa'i yon tan mngon du byed pa'i phyir /
NK106(me)003:1124: bdag gis phan yon la bsams te bsgrub par bya'o
NK106(me)003:1125: snyam du sbyor dngos rjes gsum gyis nyams su blang
NK106(me)003:1126: ngo // khrid rkang nga dgu pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1127: de nas bsgom tshul dngos la bzhi las /
NK106(me)003:1128: dang po btang snyoms bsgom pa la'ang dmigs pa dang /
NK106(me)003:1130: dmigs yul yongs su brtags nas shes par bya ba ni /
NK106(me)003:1131: da ltar pha ma dang gnyen 'dun la sogs pa rang gi phyogs la chags shing /
NK106(me)003:1132: dgra dang de'i phyogs la sdang ba'i sems 'di mi rigs te /
NK106(me)003:1133: tshe rabs snga mar dgra 'dis kyang gnyen byas la /
NK106(me)003:1134: gnyen gyis kyang dgra byas pa'i phyir ma nges pa dang /
NK106(me)003:1135: da lta'ang rtag tu dgras kyang gnod par mi nus shing bstun na gnyen zhing phan pa'ang srid la /
NK106(me)003:1136: gnyen gyis kyang tshig mi snyan par smra ba dang /
NK106(me)003:1139: de la mi 'dod pa byung na rang gi sems
NK106(me)003:1140: la zug rngu bskyed pa'i phyir dgra bzhin don la
NK106(me)003:1141: gnas pa dang / ma 'ongs pa na'ang gnyen dgrar 'gyur ba dang /
NK106(me)003:1145: gzhan phyogs la sdang ba'i sems kyis nye ring spangs
NK106(me)003:1146: la dgra gnyen ngo mnyam gyi don la brtag cing
NK106(me)003:1147: / sems can thams cad la de ltar blta ba ni yul la dmigs pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1148: blo'i rnam pa ni da ltar sems can gcig nas gnyis dang gsum dang grong gcig dang /
NK106(me)003:1149: yul khams gcig dang gling gcig nas nam mkha' matha'i bar la /
NK106(me)003:1150: nye ring chags sdang dang dmigs pa med pa'i btang
NK106(me)003:1151: snyoms chen po sbyar dngos rjes gsum pas bsgom par
NK106(me)003:1152: bya'o // khrid rkang drug cu pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1153: de nas byams pa bsgom pa'ang gnyis las /
NK106(me)003:1154: dmigs yul ni sems can thams cad de /
NK106(me)003:1155: rang phyogs la bde ba dang mi ldan pa kun bde ba dang 'phrad par smon pa bzhin /
NK106(me)003:1156: sems can thams cad bde ba dang mi ldan pa ji snyed do //
NK106(me)003:1157: kun bde ba dang phrad par gyur cig snyam du
NK106(me)003:1158: byams pas bdag gir bya ba'i yul du mthong nas
NK106(me)003:1159: / blo'i rnam pa ni rang gi pha ma lta
NK106(me)003:1160: bus mtshon nas snying nye ba dang 'phrad par 'dod
NK106(me)003:1161: / pa dang / de nas gcig nas kun gyi bar de ltar bsgoms pa'i rjes la /
NK106(me)003:1162: gang du'ang dmigs pa med pa'i ngang la mnyam par
NK106(me)003:1163: gzhag pa ni sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas nyams
NK106(me)003:1164: su blang ngo // khrid rkang drug cu rtsa gcig pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1165: de nas snying rje bsgom pa la'ang /
NK106(me)003:1166: dmigs yul sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs pa blos mi bzod pa zhig bsams la /
NK106(me)003:1167: blo'i rnam pa sdug bsngal 'di dang bral bar shog
NK106(me)003:1168: gcig snyam pa'i snying rje dung dung ba sems can
NK106(me)003:1169: gcig nas kun gyi bar la bsgoms pa'i rjes gang
NK106(me)003:1170: yang mi dmigs pa'i ngang nas dar cig mnyam par
NK106(me)003:1171: gzhag pa ste sbyor dngos rjes gsum du bya'o //
NK106(me)003:1172: khrid rkang drug cu rtsa gnyis pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1174: mtho ris kyi yul na su gang zhig bde zhing skyid pa che chung ci yod pa nas /
NK106(me)003:1175: bde ba dang ldan pa'i cha thams cad dmigs yul du byas te /
NK106(me)003:1176: blo'i rnam pa bde ba 'di dang rtag tu mi
NK106(me)003:1177: 'bral zhing 'di bas kyang skyid cing bde ba tshe
NK106(me)003:1181: shes rab che ba la sogs pas sangs rgyas ma
NK106(me)003:1182: thob kyi bar du 'byor par shog cig snyam du
NK106(me)003:1183: sems can gcig nas kun gyi bar la sbyar zhing
NK106(me)003:1184: / khyad par du rang la gnod pa'i dgra dang
NK106(me)003:1185: sems la phrag dog gi gnas su gyur pa rnams
NK106(me)003:1186: la yang dang yang du sbyang ba'i mthar stong nyid
NK106(me)003:1187: kyi ngang la bzhag pa ste sbyor dngos rjes gsum
NK106(me)003:1188: tshang bas nyams su blang ngo //
NK106(me)003:1189: khrid rkang drug cu rtsa gsum pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1190: de nas rtsal sbyang ba ni /
NK106(me)003:1195: btang snyoms bzhi pa rim pas bsgom zhing /
NK106(me)003:1196: yang bzlog nas bsgom pa btang snyoms nas byams pa'i bar dang /
NK106(me)003:1197: spel ma byams pa dga' ba /
NK106(me)003:1198: snying rje dang btang snyoms bsgom zhing /
NK106(me)003:1199: skad cig skad cig la goms par sbyang ba'o //
NK106(me)003:1200: de dag sbyor ba sems bskyed dngos gzhi de nyid la brtson bzhin du zhen pa med pa /
NK106(me)003:1201: rjes bsngo ba gsum gyis zin par nyams su blang ngo //
NK106(me)003:1202: khrid rkang drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1203: don brgyad pa byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa
NK106(me)003:1204: bslab bya dang bcas pa la phan yon bsam pa
NK106(me)003:1206: bslab bya bsam pa dang gsum las /
NK106(me)003:1208: theg pa chen po'i chos rnams kyi nang nas byang
NK106(me)003:1209: chub sems bskyed pa kho na mchog tu 'phags pa
NK106(me)003:1210: yin la / sems ma bskyed na sangs rgyas su mi 'grub la /
NK106(me)003:1212: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las skyob pa dang /
NK106(me)003:1213: nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba sel ba dang /
NK106(me)003:1214: nyan rang gi theg pa las 'phags pa dang /
NK106(me)003:1215: dge rtsa mi zad cing 'phel ba dang /
NK106(me)003:1216: bsod nams rgya chen po thob pa dang /
NK106(me)003:1217: sangs rgyas kyi gdung 'tshob pa dang /
NK106(me)003:1218: bde skyid kyi gzhi thengs pa dang /
NK106(me)003:1219: 'jig rten gyi mchod sdong du 'gyur ba dang /
NK106(me)003:1220: ci bsams thams cad 'grub pa dang /
NK106(me)003:1221: gzhan don rlabs po che 'grub pa dang /
NK106(me)003:1222: myur du byang chub thob pa la sogs pa ste /
NK106(me)003:1223: bdag gis de ring nyid du sems bskyed par bya'o
NK106(me)003:1224: snyam du sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas 'bad do
NK106(me)003:1225: // khrid rkang drug cu rtsa lnga pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1226: de nas sems bskyed tshul dngos la /
NK106(me)003:1228: dang po sngon du 'gro ba la bdun gyis phyag 'tshal ba'i yan lag ni /
NK106(me)003:1229: dkon mchog rten gyi drung du mchod pa bshams /
NK106(me)003:1230: steng gi nam mkhar bla ma dang dkon mchog yi
NK106(me)003:1231: dam mkha' 'gro chos skyong ba'i srung ma sprin phung
NK106(me)003:1233: rang gi lus brgya stong bye ba grangs med pa gzhi khyab pa tsam dang /
NK106(me)003:1234: khams gsum rigs drug gi sems can thams cad kyang phyag 'tshal bar dmigs te /
NK106(me)003:1235: bstod dbyangs dang bcas pas rtogs pa brjod pa'i mdo sde dbang po'i rgyal po dang /
NK106(me)003:1237: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan mang dang /
NK106(me)003:1239: zhi khro skong gi phyag la sogs pa /
NK106(me)003:1241: thal mo snying ga mgrin pa spyi bo gsum gang rung du sbyor la /
NK106(me)003:1242: pus mo sa la phab ste yan lag smad lnga
NK106(me)003:1243: btud pa'i phyag brgya stong mang po sbyor dngos rjes
NK106(me)003:1245: khrid rkang drug cu rtsa drug pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1246: de nas mchod pa 'bul ba'i yan lag ni /
NK106(me)003:1247: dkon mchog gi drung du ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa
NK106(me)003:1248: dang khyad par mar me'i phreng ba dang bdug spos
NK106(me)003:1250: nam mkha' dang sa gzhi thams cad lha dang mi'i
NK106(me)003:1251: mchod rdzas spos me tog mar me la sogs pa
NK106(me)003:1252: dang / gzhal yas khang dang da ga pa la
NK106(me)003:1253: sogs pa yul 'khor kun nas dga' ba sna tshogs
NK106(me)003:1254: dang / dang / rgyal srid bdun dang bkra shis brgyad la sogs pa dang /
NK106(me)003:1255: lha dang lha mo'i khyad par mang po glu gar
NK106(me)003:1256: dang rol mo'i sprin phung 'phro bas zhing khams 'di
NK106(me)003:1257: dang gzhan gyi dkon mchog thams cad mchod par bsams
NK106(me)003:1258: la / 'phags pa bzang po spyod pa dang /
NK106(me)003:1259: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod 'jug la sogs pa nas byung ba'i mchod 'bul rnams dang /
NK106(me)003:1261: dngos su 'byor dang la sogs pas mchod nas /
NK106(me)003:1262: mchod bya mchod byed mchod rdzas thams cad dmigs pa
NK106(me)003:1263: med par shes pas sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas
NK106(me)003:1264: mchod do // khri rkang drug cu rtsa bdun pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1265: de nas sdig pa bshags pa'i yan lag ni /
NK106(me)003:1266: rten gyi drung du thal mo sbyar te gnong shing 'gyod pas /
NK106(me)003:1267: dran pa dang mi dran pa'i sdig pa tshe thog ma med pa nas /
NK106(me)003:1268: de ring yan chad bsags pa /
NK106(me)003:1269: lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas /
NK106(me)003:1270: pha ma dang mkhan po slob dpon dang mched grogs dang /
NK106(me)003:1271: skye bo gzhan dag la ma gus pa byas pa /
NK106(me)003:1272: sdig pa mi dge ba bcu /
NK106(me)003:1275: dkon mchog gi dkor la 'bags pa /
NK106(me)003:1276: ser sna dang 'jur gegs byas pa la sogs pa
NK106(me)003:1277: thams cad lce thog tu nag phungs kyis 'dus par
NK106(me)003:1279: skad cig de la rten gyi sku gsung thugs las
NK106(me)003:1280: 'od byung bas phog nas sangs kyis dag par bsams
NK106(me)003:1281: la / phyis mi byed par gnyen pos bsdam zhing /
NK106(me)003:1282: sdig pa bshags pa'i tshig byang chub ltung bshags la
NK106(me)003:1283: sogs pa mdo rgyud nas byung ba kun brjod pa'i
NK106(me)003:1284: mthar / gang la bshags pa'i rten /
NK106(me)003:1286: gang gis bshags pa'i sdig pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i
NK106(me)003:1287: ngang la bzhag pa ste sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang
NK106(me)003:1289: khrid rkang drug cu rtsa brgyad pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1290: de nas rjes su yi rang ba'i yan lag ni /
NK106(me)003:1292: rgyal ba rnams kyis gzhan don du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa'i dge ba /
NK106(me)003:1293: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub kyi spyod pa rlabs po che spyad pa'i dge ba /
NK106(me)003:1294: sems can gang gis bsod nams dang thar pa cha mthun gyi dge ba bskrun pa /
NK106(me)003:1295: rang gis kyang sngar byas pa /
NK106(me)003:1297: slad kyis byed par nges pa thams cad la rjes
NK106(me)003:1298: su yi rangs dung dung ba snying thag pa nas
NK106(me)003:1299: / gcig nas kun gyis dge ba thams cad la bsgoms pa'i mthar /
NK106(me)003:1300: gang la'ang mi dmigs pa'i ngang la bzhag nas bsngo ba bya'o //
NK106(me)003:1301: khrid rkang drug cu rtsa dgu pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1302: de nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i yan lag ni /
NK106(me)003:1303: rten gyi drung du 'dug ste sems bskyed nas /
NK106(me)003:1304: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bla ma dge
NK106(me)003:1305: ba'i bshes gnyen chen po gzhan don rlabs po che
NK106(me)003:1307: chos mi gsung bar bzhugs pa dag gi drung du /
NK106(me)003:1308: sngon tshangs pa dang brgya byin gyis zhu ba phul ba ltar /
NK106(me)003:1309: bdag kyang lus bye ba mang por sprul te 'khor
NK106(me)003:1310: lo dang nor bu la sogs pa phul nas chos
NK106(me)003:1311: kyi 'khor lo bskor bar zhus pas thams cad kyis
NK106(me)003:1312: gnang nas chos kyi char phab par bsam zhing /
NK106(me)003:1313: bzang po spyod pa la sogs pa nas gsungs pa
NK106(me)003:1314: ltar brjod nas gang du'ang mi dmigs pa'i ngang las
NK106(me)003:1317: de nas mya ngan las mi 'da' bar sems can
NK106(me)003:1318: gyi don du gsol ba gdab pa'i yan lag ni
NK106(me)003:1319: / sems bskyed nas zhing khams 'di dang gzhan dag
NK106(me)003:1320: na bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
NK106(me)003:1321: dpa' gang dag sems can gyi don mdzad zin nas
NK106(me)003:1322: mya ngan las 'da' bar dgongs pa dag gi mdun
NK106(me)003:1323: / du / sngon dge bsnyen tsun+dasa gsol ba btab pa ltar /
NK106(me)003:1324: bdag gi lus mang por sprul pa dag gis gsol ba btab pas /
NK106(me)003:1325: 'khor ba ma stongs kyi bar du bzhugs nas don
NK106(me)003:1326: mdzad par bsams la mdo dang bstan bcos dag nas
NK106(me)003:1327: 'byung ba ltar brjod pa'i rjes la gang du'ang mi
NK106(me)003:1329: khrid rkang bdun cu don gcig pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1330: de nas bsngo ba'i yan lag ni /
NK106(me)003:1332: da ltar byas pa'i dge ba 'dis mtshon nas /
NK106(me)003:1333: rang gzhan dus gsum dang 'brel par bsags pa'i dge
NK106(me)003:1334: ba thams cad sems can thams cad kyi don du
NK106(me)003:1335: sangs rgyas kyi bar bsngo ba ste /
NK106(me)003:1336: de'i tshig kyang 'phags pa rnams kyis mdo rgyud dang bstan bcos chen por gsungs pa bzhin brjod nas /
NK106(me)003:1337: dar cig rang bzhin med pa'i ngang du bzhag pa'i rjes la yang bsngo bar bya'o //
NK106(me)003:1338: khrid rkang bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1340: de nas rten gyi drung du thal mo sbyar te /
NK106(me)003:1341: bdag gis sems can gyi don du byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas /
NK106(me)003:1342: spyod pa rlabs po che la bslab cing 'khor ba
NK106(me)003:1343: nas sems can gcig kyang mi gnas pa de tsam
NK106(me)003:1344: du brtson 'grus brtsam snyam pas tshig gi rgyal po
NK106(me)003:1346: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba dus 'di nas snying
NK106(me)003:1347: po byang chub la mchis kyi bar du bla ma
NK106(me)003:1348: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po rnams la skyabs su
NK106(me)003:1349: mchi'o // rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la skyabs su mchi'o //
NK106(me)003:1350: zhi ba 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog dam pa'i chos rnams la skyabs su mchi'o //
NK106(me)003:1351: tshogs rnams kyi mchog 'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun rnams la skyabs su mchi'o //
NK106(me)003:1352: bdag byang chub sems dpar rjes su gzung du gsol /
NK106(me)003:1353: bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po rnams dang /
NK106(me)003:1354: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang sa chen po
NK106(me)003:1355: la bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams
NK106(me)003:1357: ji ltar sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /
NK106(me)003:1358: sa chen po la bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
NK106(me)003:1359: rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi don du byang
NK106(me)003:1360: chub mchog tu thugs bskyed pa de bzhin du /
NK106(me)003:1361: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang dus 'di nas bzung ste /
NK106(me)003:1362: snying po byang chub la mchis kyi bar du sems
NK106(me)003:1363: can thams cad kyi don du byang chub chen por
NK106(me)003:1365: sems can ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bar bagyi'o //
NK106(me)003:1366: ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar bagyi'o //
NK106(me)003:1367: dbugs ma phyung rnams dbugs dbyung bar bagyi'o //
NK106(me)003:1368: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams yongs su
NK106(me)003:1369: mya ngan las 'da' bar bagyi'o zhes lan gsum brjod
NK106(me)003:1370: do // don dam sems bskyed ni mtshan nyid bsgoms stobs kyis thob pa las /
NK106(me)003:1371: cho ga la mi ltos par mkhas pa rnams bzhed do //
NK106(me)003:1372: de ltar brjod pa gsum gyi mthar bdag nyid byang chub sems dpar gyur /
NK106(me)003:1373: mi'i srid pa don dang bcas lha dang bcas pa'i mchod sdong du gyur /
NK106(me)003:1374: las kyi dbang gis ngan 'gror ltung ba'i sgo 'phar bcad /
NK106(me)003:1375: bde ba nas bde bar mtho ris kyi 'jig rten rnams su 'gro /
NK106(me)003:1377: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sras su gyur /
NK106(me)003:1378: byang chub myur du thob pa la bsams te gzengs bstod de spro dga' bskyed do //
NK106(me)003:1379: khrid rkang bdun cu rtsa gsum pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1380: de nas bslab bya bsam pa la smon 'jug gnyis las /
NK106(me)003:1381: dang po smon pa'i bslab bya bsam pa la /
NK106(me)003:1384: gzhan gces par gzung ba byang chub bsgom pa gsum las /
NK106(me)003:1386: sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag gzhan mnyam
NK106(me)003:1387: pa byang chub kyi sems bsgom snyam du byang chub
NK106(me)003:1389: 'di ltar sems can thams cad dang bdag gnyis bde ba 'dod /
NK106(me)003:1391: rtag tu skyid cing legs na dga' bar chabs gcig
NK106(me)003:1392: kyang sems can gyis de'i rgyu dge sdig blang dor
NK106(me)003:1393: gyi gnas la rmongs pas rtag tu sdug bsngal ba
NK106(me)003:1395: kye ma sems can bde ba dang mi ldan pa rnams bde ba dang 'phrad /
NK106(me)003:1396: sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa rnams sdug bsngal dang bral /
NK106(me)003:1397: bde zhing skyid pa rnams dga' bde de dang dus rtag tu mi 'bral /
NK106(me)003:1398: nye ring chags sdang can rnams chags sdang med pa'i btang snyoms la gnas /
NK106(me)003:1399: kun kyang thar pa'i lam la zhugs te rtag tu dge ba'i chos la spyod cing /
NK106(me)003:1400: bdag dang sems can thams cad myur du rdzogs pa'i
NK106(me)003:1401: sangs rgyas thob par gyur cig snyam du snying thag
NK106(me)003:1402: pa nas 'dun pa drag pos bsgoms pa'i rjes la
NK106(me)003:1403: / chos thams cad gang du'ang ma grub pa'i stong
NK106(me)003:1404: pa nyid la dar cig glod nas 'khor gsum rnam
NK106(me)003:1405: par dag pas bsngo ba bya'o //
NK106(me)003:1406: khrid rkang bdun cu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1407: de nas bdag gzhan barje ba byang chub kyi sems ni /
NK106(me)003:1408: gang snying rje ba'i sems kyis gcig thog mar mdun du bsams nas /
NK106(me)003:1409: rang gi bde ba dang legs pa lus longs spyod
NK106(me)003:1410: dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bcas pa thams cad blos
NK106(me)003:1411: lings kyis phud de gos g.yogs pa ltar de la
NK106(me)003:1412: sbyin pas bde zhing skyid par 'gyur /
NK106(me)003:1413: de'i sdug bsngal ci yod pa kun tshur blangs te
NK106(me)003:1414: rang gi steng du bzhag pas sdug cing bsngal ba
NK106(me)003:1415: la dga' ba bskyed de dang du blangs pa ni
NK106(me)003:1416: gos barje ba ltar bya zhing /
NK106(me)003:1417: 'byongs dus dbugs phar rgyu ba na bdag gi dge ba sems can la sbyin /
NK106(me)003:1418: tshur rngub dus sems can gyi sdug bsngal dang du blangs pa la sbyang ngo //
NK106(me)003:1419: de ltar sems can gcig nas thams cad kyi bar
NK106(me)003:1420: du btang len spel mar bya zhing lhag pa'i brtson
NK106(me)003:1421: 'grus nyin mtshan du 'bad de sbyor dngos rjes gsum
NK106(me)003:1422: tshang bas nyams su blang ngo //
NK106(me)003:1423: khrid rkang bdun cu rtsa lnga pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1424: de nas gzhan gces par bzung ba'i byang chub kyi sems ni /
NK106(me)003:1425: bu gcig pa'i ma bu la brtse ba ltar bsgom ste /
NK106(me)003:1426: sems bskyed nas gang skye bar sla ba'i sems can
NK106(me)003:1427: snying la ma gcig mdun du bsams nas de'i sdug
NK106(me)003:1428: bsngal blos mi bzod pa tsam du bdag gis dang
NK106(me)003:1429: du blang zhing bdag gi dge ba de la byin
NK106(me)003:1434: nyams nyes ci byung yang bzod kyi /
NK106(me)003:1435: 'di 'khor bar 'khyams sdug bsngal bar ga la bzod
NK106(me)003:1436: snyam du brtse sems thun mong ma yin pa bskyed
NK106(me)003:1437: do // de bzhin du sems can kun la bsgom zhing /
NK106(me)003:1438: sems can thams cad kyi gnyer ka nga la yod snyam nas /
NK106(me)003:1441: gang ci mthong ba dang thos pa'i sems can gyis
NK106(me)003:1442: mtshon nas nam mkha' mtha' khyab kyi sems can kun
NK106(me)003:1443: la lhag pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyis blta zhing
NK106(me)003:1444: / thun rjes dmigs pa med pa'i ngang las bsngo ba bya'o //
NK106(me)003:1445: khrid rkang bdun cu rtsa drug pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1446: de nas 'jug pa'i bslab bya pha rol tu phyin pa drug las /
NK106(me)003:1447: dang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
NK106(me)003:1448: ngas sems can gyi don du sbyin pa gtong snyam du sems bskyed nas /
NK106(me)003:1449: sems can gyi yul la dngos su zang zing dang chos kyi sbyin pa ci 'grub dang /
NK106(me)003:1450: yid kyis lus longs spyod dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bcas pa sbyin te /
NK106(me)003:1451: gtong ba dang yongs su gtong ba dang shin tu gtong ba gsum dngos dang yid kyis bya /
NK106(me)003:1452: dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa ci 'grub dang /
NK106(me)003:1453: ting nge 'dzin yid kyis mchod pa 'bul /
NK106(me)003:1454: 'byung po dang yi dgas la gtor ma dang chu sbyin gtong nas /
NK106(me)003:1455: gang yang dmigs su med pa'i ngang nas bsngo ba bya'o //
NK106(me)003:1456: khrid rkang bdun cu rtsa bdun pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1457: de nas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la /
NK106(me)003:1458: ngo bo dang khyad par la bslab pa gnyis las /
NK106(me)003:1460: nyes spyod spangs pa'i sems dge bas rgyud bsdam pa yin te /
NK106(me)003:1462: byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba yin na /
NK106(me)003:1463: sngar nyan thos kyi skabs su blangs pa'i sdom khrims
NK106(me)003:1464: la nan tan du byed cing bshags sdom dang gnyen
NK106(me)003:1465: po bsten pa'i steng du smon 'jug byang chub kyi
