NK106(me)003:1466: sems bsrung zhing / yang dang yang du cho gas blangs pa dang /
NK106(me)003:1467: khyim pa yin na'ang byang chub kyi sdom pa la bslab pa dang /
NK106(me)003:1468: gnyis ka sa rang gi rgyud sdom pa dang /
NK106(me)003:1469: gzhan la phan gdags pa dang /
NK106(me)003:1470: cho gas yang yang blang zhing rjes la mi dmigs pa'i ngang las bsngo ba bya'o //
NK106(me)003:1471: khrid rkang bdun cu rtsa brgyad pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1472: de nas khyad par la bslab pa la gnyis las /
NK106(me)003:1474: spyod yul dag pa phal po che la /
NK106(me)003:1475: byang chub sems dpa' khang pa'i nang du 'jug pa'i tshe /
NK106(me)003:1476: sems can thams cad kyis thar pa'i grong khyer thob par gyur cig snyam du sems bskyed do //
NK106(me)003:1477: nyal ba'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku thob par gyur cig dang /
NK106(me)003:1478: rmi lam rmis pa na chos thams cad rmi lam lta bur rtogs par gyur cig dang /
NK106(me)003:1479: ske rags 'ching ba na dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'brel bar gyur cig dang /
NK106(me)003:1480: stan la 'dug pa na rdo rje'i gdan thob par gyur cig dang /
NK106(me)003:1481: me btang ba na nyon mongs pa'i bud shing bsreg par gyur cig dang /
NK106(me)003:1482: 'bar ba na ye shes kyi me 'bar bar gyur cig dang /
NK106(me)003:1483: g.yos zin pa na ye shes kyi bdud rtsi thob par gyur cig dang /
NK106(me)003:1484: kha zas za ba na bsam gtan gyi zas thob par gyur cig dang /
NK106(me)003:1485: phyir 'gro ba na 'khor ba'i grong las thar par gyur cig dang /
NK106(me)003:1486: skas las 'bab pa na sems can gyi don la 'khor bar 'jug par gyur cig dang /
NK106(me)003:1487: sgo 'byed pa na thar pa'i grong gi sgo 'byed par gyur cig dang /
NK106(me)003:1488: sgo gcod pa na ngan song gi sgo gcod par gyur cig dang /
NK106(me)003:1489: lam du 'jug pa na 'phags pa'i lam du 'jug par gyur cig dang /
NK106(me)003:1490: gyen la 'gro ba na sems can thams cad mtho
NK106(me)003:1491: ris kyi bde ba la 'god par gyur cig dang
NK106(me)003:1492: / thur la 'bab pa na ngan song gsum rgyun gcod par gyur cig dang /
NK106(me)003:1493: sems can dang 'phrad pa na sangs rgyas mjal bar gyur cig dang /
NK106(me)003:1494: rkang pa 'jog pa na sems can thams cad kyi don la 'gro bar gyur cig dang /
NK106(me)003:1495: rkang pa 'degs pa na 'khor ba nas 'don par gyur cig dang /
NK106(me)003:1496: rgyan dang ldan pa mthong na mtshan dang dpe byad kyi rgyan thob par gyur cig dang /
NK106(me)003:1497: rgyan med pa mthong na sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan par gyur cig dang /
NK106(me)003:1498: snod gang ba mthong na yon tan gyis gang bar gyur cig dang /
NK106(me)003:1499: stong pa mthong na skyon gyis stong par gyur cig dang /
NK106(me)003:1500: sems can dga' ba mthong na chos la dga' bar gyur cig dang /
NK106(me)003:1501: mi dga' ba mthong na 'dus byas kyi dngos po la mi dga' bar gyur cig dang /
NK106(me)003:1502: sems can bde ba mthong na sangs rgyas kyi bde ba thob par gyur cig dang /
NK106(me)003:1503: sdug bsngal ba mthong na sems can gyi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar gyur cig dang /
NK106(me)003:1504: nad pa mthong na nad las grol bar gyur cig dang /
NK106(me)003:1505: drin du gzo ba mthong na sangs rgyas byang chub
NK106(me)003:1506: sems dpa' thams cad la drin lan ldan par gyur
NK106(me)003:1507: cig dang / driin du mi gzo ba mthong na
NK106(me)003:1508: lta ba log pa la drin du mi gzo bar
NK106(me)003:1509: cig dang / gyur cig dang / rgol ba mthong
NK106(me)003:1510: na phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod nus
NK106(me)003:1512: bstod pa mthong na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bstod par gyur cig dang /
NK106(me)003:1513: chos kyi gtam byed pa mthong na sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa thob par gyur cig dang /
NK106(me)003:1514: sku gzugs mthong na sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba la sgrib pa med par gyur cig dang /
NK106(me)003:1515: mchod rten mthong na 'gro ba thams cad kyi mchod rten du gyur par mthong bar gyur cig dang /
NK106(me)003:1516: tshong byed pa mthong na 'phags pa'i nor bdun thob par gyur cig dang /
NK106(me)003:1517: phyag 'tshal bar mthong na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig
NK106(me)003:1518: rten gyi spyi gtsug bltar mi mngon pa thob par
NK106(me)003:1519: gyur cig snyam du sems bskyed do zhes pa'i don
NK106(me)003:1520: sbyor dngos rjes gsum gyis nyams su blang ngo //
NK106(me)003:1521: khrid rkang bdun cu rtsa dgu pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1522: de nas phyogs gnyis pa skyes bu chen po'i rnam rtog brgyad bsgom pa ni /
NK106(me)003:1523: sems bskyed nas bdag gis nam zhig sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sel nus /
NK106(me)003:1524: nam zhig dbul bas nyen pa'i sems can rnams 'byor pa chen po la 'jog nus /
NK106(me)003:1525: nam zhig sha khrag dang bcas pa'i lus kyis sems can gyi don nus /
NK106(me)003:1526: nam zhig dmyal bar yun ring du gnas kyang sems can la phan 'dogs nus /
NK106(me)003:1527: nam zhig 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
NK106(me)003:1528: 'byor pa chen pos sems can gyi re ba rdzogs
NK106(me)003:1529: par byed nus / nam zhig sangs rgyas su gyur
NK106(me)003:1530: nas sems can gyi sdug bsngal thams cad nges par
NK106(me)003:1531: par byed nus / 'byin nus / nam zhig sems can la mi phan pa'i skye ba dang /
NK106(me)003:1532: don dam pa'i ro la gcig tu spyod pa dang /
NK106(me)003:1533: skye bo thams cad la sim par mi byed pa'i tshig dang /
NK106(me)003:1534: gzhan la mi phan pa'i 'tsho ba dang /
NK106(me)003:1535: lus dang shes rab dang nor dang dbang phyug dang ldan pa dang /
NK106(me)003:1536: gzhan la gnod pa byed pa la dga' bar tshe
NK106(me)003:1537: rabs thams cad du ma gyur cig snyam pa dang
NK106(me)003:1538: / nam zhig sems can gyi sdig pa'i 'bras bu bdag la smin cing /
NK106(me)003:1539: bdag gi dge ba'i 'bras bu sems can la smin
NK106(me)003:1540: pas bde bar gyur cig snyam du bsam zhing rjes
NK106(me)003:1543: de nas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis las /
NK106(me)003:1544: dmigs pa dang bcas pa ni /
NK106(me)003:1545: 'di ltar dam pa'i chos bsgrub pa na /
NK106(me)003:1546: dka' spyad kyi sdug bsngal la bzod pa /
NK106(me)003:1547: gzhan gyi sdug bsngal dang len du bzod pa /
NK106(me)003:1548: chos chen po'i gnas la mi skrag par bzod pa /
NK106(me)003:1549: rang gi sems la bsran bzod pa rnams yin yang /
NK106(me)003:1550: skabs 'dir gtso bo gzhan gyi gnod pa la rang
NK106(me)003:1551: gi khro ba mi mched par bzod pa bsgom ste
NK106(me)003:1552: / sems can thams cad du bzod pa sgom snyam du sems bskyed nas /
NK106(me)003:1553: 'khor gyis log bsgrubs sam don yod dam med pa'i
NK106(me)003:1554: 'tshe ba ci byung yang gze re'i sems btang nas
NK106(me)003:1556: sems can rang bzhin gnod pa can yin pas kyang de 'byung la /
NK106(me)003:1557: gnod lan gzhal gyis longs pa med pas bsran gzugs shing /
NK106(me)003:1558: bdag gis kyang sngon dus de ltar byas pa'i las ngan yin la /
NK106(me)003:1559: bsran bzod na bsod nams kyi dam pa thob pas kyang bzod par rigs shing /
NK106(me)003:1560: rang gi las ma gtogs pa de'i gnod pas mtho dman mi nus pas kyang bzod par 'os la /
NK106(me)003:1561: bcos su 'dug na de'i thabs la 'bad /
NK106(me)003:1562: mi 'dug na mi bzod pa'i sems kyi gze res rang sdug pa las khebs med la /
NK106(me)003:1563: slar gzhan gyi gnod pa je 'phel du 'gro bas
NK106(me)003:1564: kyang zug rngu'i sems kun nas khro ba spangs te
NK106(me)003:1565: / lhod kyis zhi ba'i ngang la glod nas rjes la 'khor gsum dag pas bsngo ba bya'o //
NK106(me)003:1566: khrid rkang brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1567: de nas dmigs pa med pa'i bzod pa ni /
NK106(me)003:1568: gnod byed dang bdag gi lus la rdul phran du gzhig pas cha med stong pa /
NK106(me)003:1569: ngag la kha dog dang ngos gzung gzhig pas rang yal rjes med /
NK106(me)003:1570: sems la ngo bo ngos gzung bltas pas dngos med du 'dug ste /
NK106(me)003:1572: gnod pa gtam mi snyan pa dang 'tshe ba dang yid mi bde ba la sogs pa /
NK106(me)003:1573: gnod yul bdag rnams stong pa ris med du dag pas /
NK106(me)003:1574: skye ba med pa'i ngang la glod nas bzhag go //
NK106(me)003:1575: de'ang sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas nyams su blang ngo //
NK106(me)003:1576: khrid rkang brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1577: de nas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
NK106(me)003:1579: 'di ltar le los ni rang gi don yang mi 'grub na /
NK106(me)003:1580: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos /
NK106(me)003:1581: bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don bsgrub dgos pas brtson par bya'o snyam nas /
NK106(me)003:1583: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang /
NK106(me)003:1584: phyag dang bskor ba la sogs pa ci 'grub dang /
NK106(me)003:1585: khyad par du yan lag bdun pa dang phung po gsum pa'i lag len la 'bad nas /
NK106(me)003:1586: rjes la 'khor gsum mi dmigs pa'i ngang las bsngo ba bya'o //
NK106(me)003:1587: khrid rkang brgyad cu rtsa gsum pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1588: de nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la drug las /
NK106(me)003:1589: dang po 'gyur zhing mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin la bsam pa ni /
NK106(me)003:1590: 'di ltar skyes pa thams cad ni 'chi /
NK106(me)003:1592: bsags pa thams cad ni 'dzad de /
NK106(me)003:1593: 'byor pa thams cad ni rgad pa'i mtha' can te /
NK106(me)003:1594: g.yo zhing snying po med pa tshe 'di'i snang ba
NK106(me)003:1595: mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin la chags pa rnams re
NK106(me)003:1599: do nub kyang mi 'chi ba'i dbang po med na /
NK106(me)003:1600: 'khrul snang tshe 'di'i snang bas ci bya /
NK106(me)003:1601: 'chi ba'i dus su phan par nges pa zab mo'i
NK106(me)003:1602: gdams ngag yin pas bsam gtan bsgom pa la 'bad
NK106(me)003:1607: thang cig 'gyur bas kyang 'chi ba la nyer song
NK106(me)003:1608: snyam du sbyor dngos rjes gsum gyis nyams su blang
NK106(me)003:1609: ngo // khrid rkang brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1610: de nas 'dod pa'i nyes dmigs bsam pa ni /
NK106(me)003:1611: 'di ltar 'dod pa rnams ni nyes pa mang ba ste /
NK106(me)003:1612: bsags pa bsrung ba spel ba gsum gyis brel zhing mi dge ba 'phel ba /
NK106(me)003:1613: kun dang rtsod pa dang bcas pa /
NK106(me)003:1615: khengs shing ser sna 'phel ba zad kyis dogs /
NK106(me)003:1618: rkun po la sogs pa thams cad dang thun mong pa /
NK106(me)003:1619: bsags kyang 'chi ba'i dus su thams cad 'jog cing 'bral ba'i rang bzhin can /
NK106(me)003:1620: ji tsam du 'byor pa de tsam du sdug bsngal ba de bas mang ba ste /
NK106(me)003:1624: tshul khrims la sogs pa rnam par grol ba'i chos dang 'gal ba /
NK106(me)003:1625: 'phags pa rnams kyis kun tu smad pa'o snyam du bsams nas /
NK106(me)003:1626: rjes la skye ba med pa'i ngang du gzhag go //
NK106(me)003:1627: de yang sbyor dngos rjes gsum nges pas nyams su blang ngo //
NK106(me)003:1628: khrid rkang brgyad cu rtsa lnga pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1629: de nas byis dang 'grogs pa'i nyes pa bsam pa ni /
NK106(me)003:1631: 'di ltar khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba la
NK106(me)003:1632: sogs par snang ba so sor skye bo'i tshogs kyi
NK106(me)003:1637: bar ma'i phyogs thams cad kyang 'grogs par mi bzod de /
NK106(me)003:1640: phan pa'i lan du gnod pa sbyin pa /
NK106(me)003:1645: rang gi 'dod pa 'ab zhig sgrub pa /
NK106(me)003:1646: gzhan la ngang gis gnod pa /
NK106(me)003:1648: rang gi 'byor pa dang legs pa nyams na 'dor zhing thing slod byed pa /
NK106(me)003:1650: chos dang dam tshig la sogs pa dang /
NK106(me)003:1651: la yogs dang rnam smin gang la'ang mi 'dzem pa /
NK106(me)003:1652: don dang bya ba mang ba /
NK106(me)003:1653: mgu bar shin tu dka' ba /
NK106(me)003:1656: phrag dog pa la sogs pa chos ma yin pa
NK106(me)003:1657: 'ba' zhig gis bslu zhing tshe 'da' ba'i rang bzhin
NK106(me)003:1658: te / 'grogs pa tsam gyis dge ba 'grib cing mi dge ba 'phel ba'i byis pa rnams ni /
NK106(me)003:1659: 'phags pa rnams kyis kyang ring du spang ba'i phyir /
NK106(me)003:1660: bdag kyang thar pa'i dam pa bsgrub pa la bar
NK106(me)003:1661: du gcod pas su dang yang 'grogs par mi bya
NK106(me)003:1662: / gcig pu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgrub snyam du bsam zhing rjes la bsngo ba bya'o //
NK106(me)003:1663: khrid rkang brgyad cu rtsa drug pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1664: de nas 'du 'dzi'i nyes pa bsam pa ni /
NK106(me)003:1666: 'di ltar spyir 'jig rten gyi snang ba /
NK106(me)003:1667: sgos tshe 'di'i bya ba rnams la zin pa dang chog pa'i dus med pa /
NK106(me)003:1668: rtag tu brel zhing g.yengs la don chung ba /
NK106(me)003:1669: ji tsam brtson kyang snying po med pa /
NK106(me)003:1670: dgra btul yang mtha' med pa /
NK106(me)003:1671: gnyen bskyangs kyang mtha' med pa /
NK106(me)003:1672: tshong so nam bzo rigs shes gnyen ci byas kyang lto gos kyi rtsol sgrub las /
NK106(me)003:1673: byas pa don du 'gyur ba chos kyi lam du 'gro ba rdul tsam yang med pa /
NK106(me)003:1674: nyin mo mtshan mo 'khor yug tu rnam g.yeng gi 'du 'dzis dus 'da' ba 'dis ci byed /
NK106(me)003:1675: da res tshe 'di blos btang na bsam gtan bsgom snyam du bsams pa'i rjes la bsngo ba bya'o //
NK106(me)003:1676: khrid rkang brgyad cu rtsa bdun pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1677: de nas dben pa'i yon tan bsam pa ni /
NK106(me)003:1678: sngon gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
NK106(me)003:1679: cad kyang zhi ba'i nags su bsgrubs pa las bdud
NK106(me)003:1681: bdag kyang dben pa'i nags su 'gro bar spro ste /
NK106(me)003:1682: de na 'du 'dzi dang rnam g.yengs med /
NK106(me)003:1683: bya ba dang brel do med /
NK106(me)003:1686: bya dang ri dgas 'grogs na bde bas gang /
NK106(me)003:1687: chu dang lo ma la sogs pa dka' thub kyi zas dang mthun /
NK106(me)003:1688: phug dang brag ri'i drung la sogs pa gnas mal chos dang mthun /
NK106(me)003:1689: su yang bshes 'dris med pas dge ba ngang gis 'phel /
NK106(me)003:1690: rig pa ngang gis dngas pas shes rab gsal la dngas /
NK106(me)003:1691: des na dben pa'i yon tan mang bas de ring
NK106(me)003:1692: nyid nas dben par gnas dgos snyam du bsam zhing
NK106(me)003:1694: khrid rkang brgyad cu rtsa brgyad pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1695: de nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dngos ni /
NK106(me)003:1696: rnam snang gi chos bdun dang ldan pas skyabs su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed de /
NK106(me)003:1697: gang du'ang mi rtog ci yang mi 'dzin pa'i ngang la ma yengs par lhan ne bzhag pas /
NK106(me)003:1698: snang yul ma 'gags la 'dzin rtog zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin skye'o //
NK106(me)003:1700: khrid rkang brgyad cu rtsa dgu pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1701: de nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gsum las /
NK106(me)003:1702: dang po snang ba'i rang bzhin sgyu ma'i dpe brgyad du blta ba ni /
NK106(me)003:1704: 'di ltar phyi yul lngar snang ba thams cad ni med bzhin 'khrul pa'i ngo la snang bas /
NK106(me)003:1705: rmi lam gyi snang ba lta bu /
NK106(me)003:1706: rgyu rkyen rten 'brel gyi tshogs pa las glo bur bar snang bas sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bu /
NK106(me)003:1707: med la yod par snang bas mig yor gyi snang ba lta bu /
NK106(me)003:1708: snang dus bden par med pas smig rgyu'i rnam pa lta bu /
NK106(me)003:1709: phyi nang gang la snang bas brag ca'i sgra brnyan lta bu /
NK106(me)003:1710: rten dang brten par med pas dri za'i grong khyer lta bu /
NK106(me)003:1711: snang la rang bzhin med pas gzugs brnyan gyi snang ba lta bu /
NK106(me)003:1712: med snang cir yang shar bas sprul pa'i grong khyer lta bu /
NK106(me)003:1713: ji ltar snang bzhin pa'i dus nas brdzun la dngos
NK106(me)003:1714: po med pa'i stong gzugs su 'dug snyam du bsgoms
NK106(me)003:1717: de nas chos nyid stong pa la brtag pa ni sems bskyed nas /
NK106(me)003:1718: phyi yul snang rags pa dang /
NK106(me)003:1719: rang gi lus kyi dngos po 'di rdul phran du gzhigs pas yul med stong par thag chod /
NK106(me)003:1720: nang 'dzin pa'i sems la skad cig cha med du brtags pas 'dzin med stong par thag chod /
NK106(me)003:1721: gzung 'dzin gang du'ang ma grub par rtogs pa'i ngang
NK106(me)003:1722: der stong pa gtad med du mnyam par bzhag nas
NK106(me)003:1724: khrid rkang dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1725: de nas mtha' bral dbu ma'i don la bzhag pa ni /
NK106(me)003:1726: skyabs su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed nas /
NK106(me)003:1732: nang rig pa stong gsal dngas la 'dzin zhen gyi spros pa zhi /
NK106(me)003:1733: bar lus sems rten med la rang ngam gyis chos nyid shar te /
NK106(me)003:1734: stong gsal nam mkha' lta bu'i rig pa /
NK106(me)003:1735: smra bsam brjod med chen po'i ye shes /
NK106(me)003:1736: blo bral dbu ma'i de kho na nyid kyi ngang
NK106(me)003:1737: la ji tsam gnas kyi bar du mnyam par gzhag
NK106(me)003:1738: / rjes snang rmi lam sgyu ma'i ngang la bsngo ba bya'o //
NK106(me)003:1739: khrid rkang dgu bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1740: 'di ni mtshan nyid rgyu yi theg pa ste //
NK106(me)003:1741: dus gsum rgyal ba snga phyi'i gshegs shul yin //
NK106(me)003:1742: rang bzhin don gnyis bsgrub pa'i don chen te //
NK106(me)003:1743: gnas skabs mthar thug don gnyis phun tshogs yin //
NK106(me)003:1744: mdo dang bstan bcos kun gyi snying po'i don //
NK106(me)003:1745: ji ltar nyams len phyogs gcig bkod pa des //
NK106(me)003:1746: ma lus 'gro kun thar pa'i lam zhugs te //
NK106(me)003:1747: sku dang ye shes phrin las lhun grub shog /
NK106(me)003:1748: rdzogs pa chen po sems nyid ngal gso'i don khrid byang chub lam bzang las /
NK106(me)003:1749: thog mar dge ba rgyu mtshan nyid kyi theg pa'i gnas bstan pa ste dang po'o ////
NK106(me)003:1750: spyi don gnyis pa nang khyad par gyi lam 'bras
NK106(me)003:1751: bu gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa bar du dge
NK106(me)003:1752: ba'i khrid kyi rim pa rgya cher bstan pa la
NK106(me)003:1753: / bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa /
NK106(me)003:1756: spyir gsang sngags gsar rnying gi rgyud sde'i gnas mang
NK106(me)003:1757: du thos shing de dag gi man ngag thams cad
NK106(me)003:1758: 'dus pa'i snying po yin pas brgyud rim du ma
NK106(me)003:1760: 'dir gtso bo'i dbang du byas te gsang sngags rnying
NK106(me)003:1761: ma nges pa don gyi snying po sgyu 'phrul dra
NK106(me)003:1762: ba chen po'i bla ma brgyud rim bstan pa ni
NK106(me)003:1763: / rgyal ba dgongs pa'i brgyud pa /
NK106(me)003:1765: gang zag snyan khung du brgyud pa dang gsum las /
NK106(me)003:1767: chos sku kun tu bzang po /
NK106(me)003:1768: longs sku rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas /
NK106(me)003:1769: sprul sku rigs gsum mgon pos gnas rigs so sor
NK106(me)003:1770: mi ma yin gyi rig 'dzin tha dad la brgyud
NK106(me)003:1772: phyag na rdo rje la rgyal po dzas zhus pa /
NK106(me)003:1784: dar rje dpal gyi grags pa /
NK106(me)003:1795: slob dpon gzhon nu don grub /
NK106(me)003:1796: des bsam yas pa ngag gi dbang po la'o //
NK106(me)003:1797: rgyal ba kun gyi rnam 'phrul mchog /
NK106(me)003:1798: yon tan rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin //
NK106(me)003:1799: rlabs chen phrin las dpag tu med //
NK106(me)003:1800: bla ma kun la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK106(me)003:1801: gnyis pa gdams khrid rgya cher bstan pa la /
NK106(me)003:1805: rnal 'byor chen po bla na med pa'i rgyud kyi bskyed rdzogs bstan pa dang bzhi las /
NK106(me)003:1807: rgyu mtshan nyid kyi theg pa dang gsang sngags gnyis /
NK106(me)003:1808: 'bras bu sangs rgyas bsgrub par don gcig na'ang /
NK106(me)003:1809: sngags kyi theg pa bsgrub tshul gyi lam zab cing rgya che ba'i gnas la ma rmongs pa dang /
NK106(me)003:1812: dbang po shin tu rnon po'i dbang du byas pas khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir /
NK106(me)003:1813: gang zag gcig myur du 'tshang rgya bar byed pa'i theg pa bla na med pa ste /
NK106(me)003:1814: de'ang gang zag gcig gi rgyud la de gnyis bsgrub pa na'ang /
NK106(me)003:1815: mtshan nyid theg pa sngags su 'jug pa'i lam stegs sngon 'gro'i chos yin la /
NK106(me)003:1817: 'dir de bsgoms pa'ang dang por 'jug pa'i sgo k+r+ai ya'i theg pa yin zhing /
NK106(me)003:1818: de'i lha thugs rje chen po la sogs pa ste /
NK106(me)003:1819: khrus dang gtsang sbra sngon du song bas 'jug pa las /
NK106(me)003:1820: 'dir thugs rje chen po bsgom pa'i tshul la /
NK106(me)003:1821: skyabs su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed nas /
NK106(me)003:1822: mdun gyi nam mkhar pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du
NK106(me)003:1823: 'jig rten dbang phyug sku mdog dkar po zhal gcig
NK106(me)003:1824: phyag bzhi pa / ral pa'i thor gtsug can /
NK106(me)003:1825: rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang /
NK106(me)003:1831: rdo rje'i skyil krung mdzad pa /
NK106(me)003:1832: phyag dang po gnyis thugs kar thal mo sbyar ba /
NK106(me)003:1834: g.yon 'og ma pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa /
NK106(me)003:1835: thugs kar pad zla'i dbus su h+r+aihl yi ge drug
NK106(me)003:1836: pas bskor ba las 'od 'phros pas bdag dang sems
NK106(me)003:1839: thams cad yi ge bdun pa brjod par bsams la /
NK106(me)003:1840: ma ni pad+me h'u h+r+aih zhes gdangs snyan pos bzlas pa'i mthar /
NK106(me)003:1841: thugs rje chen po'i sku'i 'od zer sems can la phog pas stong par yal /
NK106(me)003:1843: thugs rje chen po'ang dmigs pa med pa'i ngang la dar cig bzhag nas bsngo ba bya'o //
NK106(me)003:1844: 'di ni sdig sgrib sbyong ba rnams kyi nang nas mchog tu zab bo //
NK106(me)003:1845: khrid rkang dgu bcu rtsa gsum pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1846: de nas spyod pa'i rgyud ni /
NK106(me)003:1847: bdag dam tshig pa'i mdun du lha ye shes pa bzhugs pa yin te /
NK106(me)003:1848: re zhig rje btsun mi g.yo ba bsgom pa dang sbyar nas /
NK106(me)003:1849: skyabs su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed nas /
NK106(me)003:1850: swa b+h+aa wa shud+d+h+aahsarba d+har+m+aahswa b+h+aa wa bi shud+d+ho&a ham gis chos thams cad stong pa'i ngang las /
NK106(me)003:1851: pad+ma dang nyi zla'i steng du rang nyid mi g.yo ba dkar po zhal gcig spyan gsum /
NK106(me)003:1852: ya sos ma mchu mnan la /
NK106(me)003:1853: sma ra dang dbu skra dmar ser can /
NK106(me)003:1854: phyag g.yas ral gri spyi bor gdengs shing /
NK106(me)003:1855: g.yon pas sdigs mdzub thugs kar gtad pa /
NK106(me)003:1856: zhabs g.yas kyi pus mos nyi ma la btsugs shing /
NK106(me)003:1857: g.yon pa'i mthil gyis zla ba mnan pa /
NK106(me)003:1858: rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan zhing dar gyi sham thabs can /
NK106(me)003:1859: thugs kar pad+ma dang zla ba'i dbus su h+aum la rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bskor bar bsam /
NK106(me)003:1860: rang gi mdun du'ang de kho na 'dra ba'i mi g.yo ba bsams pa'i /
NK106(me)003:1861: rang gi thugs ka'i h+aum la sngags phreng 'khor ba mdun gyi zhal du zhugs /
NK106(me)003:1863: ste ba nas rang gi lte bar zhugs te 'khor ba'i 'od zer gyis /
NK106(me)003:1864: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i shes rab dang /
NK106(me)003:1868: bsod nams la sogs pa'i yon tan thams cad bsdus
NK106(me)003:1869: te rang gi snying ga'i h+aum la thim pas rang
NK106(me)003:1870: nyid yon tan de dag dang ldan par bsams la
NK106(me)003:1871: / badz+ra tsan+da ma h+aa ro sha na h'u phata /
NK106(me)003:1872: ces pa ci 'grub tu brjod nas /
NK106(me)003:1873: sngags phreng snying gar bsdus te ye shes pa gshegs /
NK106(me)003:1874: dam tshig pa mi dmigs pa'i ngang la bsngo ba bya'o //
NK106(me)003:1875: khrid rkang dgu bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1876: de nas rnal 'byor gyi rgyud ni /
NK106(me)003:1877: bdag dam tshig pa la lha ye shes pa dgug gshegs byas nas dngos grub 'dod pa yin te /
NK106(me)003:1878: 'dir re zhig ngan song sbyong ba dang sbyar na /
NK106(me)003:1879: skyabs su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed nas /
NK106(me)003:1880: stong pa'i ngang las khro bo 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba /
NK106(me)003:1881: sku mdog ljang sngon zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa /
NK106(me)003:1883: pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng na khro bo'i rgyan thams
NK106(me)003:1884: cad kyis brgyan pa'i sku las me dpung 'bar bas
NK106(me)003:1885: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad khyab /
NK106(me)003:1886: rdo rje'i ra ba gur bla res gtams shing sprul
NK106(me)003:1887: pa'i khro bo mang po sku las 'phro bar bsams
NK106(me)003:1888: la / mthe bong dang gung srin sbyar ba bkan /
NK106(me)003:1891: badz+ra sat+wa kro d+ha +aa na l+aarga ma h+aa kro
NK106(me)003:1892: d+ha dra ba dra ba bi dra ba bi dra
NK106(me)003:1894: n+aa sha ya n+aa sha ya /
NK106(me)003:1895: ha ra ha ra pra nam h+aum phata /
NK106(me)003:1896: ces pa gsum gyis bdag dang gnas dang rnal 'byor bsrungs la /
NK106(me)003:1897: de nas de'i thugs kar stong pa'i ngang las seng
NK106(me)003:1898: ge dang pad zla'i steng du rang nyid bcom ldan
NK106(me)003:1899: 'das kun rig rnam par snang mdzad dkar po zhal
NK106(me)003:1900: bzhi phyag gnyis mnyam par gzhag cing zhabs gnyis skyil
NK106(me)003:1901: krung du bzhugs pa'i rtsa zhal dkar ba /
NK106(me)003:1905: dar dang rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i thugs
NK106(me)003:1906: kar pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du la rtsa rig
NK106(me)003:1908: 'og min gyi gnas nas de kho na 'dra ba'i kun rig la /
NK106(me)003:1909: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mang pos bskor ba spyan drangs te /
NK106(me)003:1910: dzahh+aum bam hohs gnyis su med par thim par bsams la /
NK106(me)003:1911: snying ga'i rtsa rig las 'od 'phros bdag dang 'gro drug gi sgrib pa sbyangs /
NK106(me)003:1913: sems can gyi don byas par bsam zhing /
NK106(me)003:1914: na mo b+ha ga wa te /
NK106(me)003:1916: pa ri sho d+ha ni r+aa dz+aa ya /
NK106(me)003:1918: ar+ha te sa myak+sam bud+d+h+aa ya /
NK106(me)003:1920: sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ne sarba p+aa pam bi shod+ha na ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK106(me)003:1922: phyi'i mchod pa spos me tog la sogs pas mchod de /
NK106(me)003:1923: chos dbyings ye shes rnam par dag /
NK106(me)003:1924: rnam par snang mdzad bcom ldan 'das //
NK106(me)003:1925: ting nge 'dzin de phyag rgya can //
NK106(me)003:1926: phyag 'tshal bcom ldan kun rig la'o //
NK106(me)003:1928: badz+ra muhs spyan drangs pa'i ye shes pa 'og min du gshegs /
NK106(me)003:1929: dam tshig pa me long la has btab pa ltar yal te gyi bar thim nas /
NK106(me)003:1930: de yang mi dmigs pa'i ngang la dar cig mnyam par gzhag /
NK106(me)003:1931: dge ba sems can don du bsngo ba bya ba'o //
NK106(me)003:1932: 'dis ni mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyang 'dzad par gsungs pas phan yon shin tu che'o //
NK106(me)003:1933: khrid rkang dgu bcu rtsa lnga pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1934: de nas rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud la gsum las /
NK106(me)003:1935: dang po pha bla na med pa ni /
NK106(me)003:1936: chos thams cad dkyil 'khor gsum du ye nas sangs
NK106(me)003:1937: rgyas pa'i don gsal 'debs pa tsam du thabs bskyed
NK106(me)003:1938: pa'i rim pa gtso bor nyams su len pa yin
NK106(me)003:1939: te / dpal gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1940: 'dir rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud dang sbyar na /
NK106(me)003:1941: skyabs su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed nas /
NK106(me)003:1942: stong pa'i ngang las pad+ma dang nyi zla'i steng du h+r+aihdang mahyongasa su gyur pa las /
NK106(me)003:1943: rta mgrin yab yum 'akhrilasbyora brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa'i yab kyis phyag g.yas dbyug to gdengs shing /
NK106(me)003:1944: g.yon pas sdigs mdzub thugs kar gtad pa /
NK106(me)003:1945: yum gyis phyag g.yas gri gug 'phyar zhing /
NK106(me)003:1946: g.yon pas thod khrag yab la stobs pa /
NK106(me)003:1947: gnyis ka'ang zhal gcig spyan gsum pa sku mdog dmar zhing khro bo'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
NK106(me)003:1948: yab kyi dbu gtsug na rta mgo ljang zhur las rta skad phyogs mtsher ba /
NK106(me)003:1949: zhing chen gyi g.yang gzhi dang stag gi sham thabs dang thod phreng gi se ral kha 'phyangs pa /
NK106(me)003:1950: sku che la yan lag rags pa /
NK106(me)003:1951: sku las bskal pa'i me 'bar bas stong khams thams cad sreg par byed pa /
NK106(me)003:1952: thugs kar pad+ma dang nyi zla'i steng na h+aum la rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bskor bar bsams la /
NK106(me)003:1954: snang ba mtha' yas kyis dbu brgyan par bsams la /
NK106(me)003:1955: snying ga'i h+aum las me'i tsha tsha dang sprul pa'i
NK106(me)003:1956: khro chung grangs med pa 'phros te stong khams thams
NK106(me)003:1957: cad g.yo ba ldeg pa'i mer ba 'khyam par bsams
NK106(me)003:1958: la / badz+ra kro d+ha h+ya g+r+ai wa hu lu hu lu h+aum phata /
NK106(me)003:1959: ces pa ci 'grub bzlas pa'i mthar /
NK106(me)003:1960: de dag thams cad rim gyis thugs ka'i h+aum la thim nas /
NK106(me)003:1961: de yang bin d+hu'i bar mi dmigs pa chos nyid kyi ngang du bzhag nas bsngo ba bya'o //
NK106(me)003:1962: khrid rkang dgu bcu rtsa drug pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1963: de nas bla na med pa ni /
NK106(me)003:1964: chos thams cad dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med du
NK106(me)003:1965: sangs rgyas pa'i don bskyed rdzogs bde ba chen pos
NK106(me)003:1967: dpal bde mchog 'khor lo la sogs pa'o //
NK106(me)003:1968: 'dir he ru ka gal po dang bstun na /
NK106(me)003:1969: skyabs su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed de /
NK106(me)003:1970: ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bas /
NK106(me)003:1971: pad+ma dang nyi zla'i steng du rang nyid dpal chen
NK106(me)003:1972: po zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi 'dor thabs su
NK106(me)003:1973: bgrad pa / mthing nag g.yas dkar g.yon dmar spyan gsum gsum dang zhal mche ba gtsigs pa /
NK106(me)003:1974: phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje /
NK106(me)003:1979: tha ma rnga chung bsnams pa /
NK106(me)003:1980: yum badz+ra kro d+h+ai shwa ri ma mthing ga zhal gcig phyag gnyis /
NK106(me)003:1981: g.yas khu tshur yab kyi mgul nas 'khyud cing /
NK106(me)003:1982: g.yon b+han+d+ha khrag gis bkang ba yab la stobs pa /
NK106(me)003:1983: zhabs gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi barla la 'khril ba /
NK106(me)003:1984: gnyis ka'ang rin po che dang /
NK106(me)003:1986: mi mgo'i phreng ba la sogs pas brgyan pa /
NK106(me)003:1987: dpal gyi chas brgyad kyis brjid pa /
NK106(me)003:1988: me ri 'bar ba'i klong na bzhugs pa'i gtso bo'i
NK106(me)003:1989: thugs kar pad+ma nyi zla'i dbus su rdo rje nas
NK106(me)003:1990: tsam pa rtse dgu pa'i dbus kyi srog shing la
NK106(me)003:1991: h+aum / ra brgyad la nang du blta ba'i ru
NK106(me)003:1992: lu 'bru brgyad spus bris pa tsam 'od 'bar ba
NK106(me)003:1994: ye shes pa bstims nas yi ge gsum gyis rgyas gdab /
NK106(me)003:1995: mi bskyod pa tshon gang bas dbu brgyan par bsams la /
NK106(me)003:1996: h+aum dang ru lu 'bru brgyad las sngags phreng 'thon
NK106(me)003:1997: nas yab kyi zhal nas yum gyi zhal du zhugs
NK106(me)003:1998: te / sku'i dbyibs brgyud mkha' gsang nas thugs ka'i
NK106(me)003:1999: h+aum gi zhabs la thim zhing 'khor ba'i 'od kyis
NK106(me)003:2000: te / / sems can thams cad kyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa sbyangs /
NK106(me)003:2001: dpal chen po'i go 'phang la bkod do //
NK106(me)003:2003: dngos grub kyi dbyig thams cad bsdus nas snying ga'i ru lu la thim par bsam zhing /
NK106(me)003:2004: ru lu ru lu h+aum b+h+yo h+aum /
NK106(me)003:2006: de nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa gnyis las /
NK106(me)003:2008: snying ga'i ru lu phra mo de nyid la sems ma yengs par dar cig bzung bas /
NK106(me)003:2010: gzhan yang med par stong gsal spros pa dang bral
NK106(me)003:2011: ba'i ye shes 'char bas de'i ngang la glod nas
NK106(me)003:2013: snang ba thams cad tshur 'dus yum la thim /
NK106(me)003:2015: yab thugs ka'i rdo rje la thim /
NK106(me)003:2016: de yang ru lu 'bru brgyad la thim /
NK106(me)003:2018: h'u gi zhabs kyu 'a la thim /
NK106(me)003:2020: khog pa zla tshes la thim /
NK106(me)003:2021: zla tshes bin d+hu la thim /
NK106(me)003:2022: bin d+hu chos kyi dbyings su thim pas /
NK106(me)003:2023: bltar med bsam du med pa'i ngang la gzhag go //
NK106(me)003:2026: khrid rkang dgu bcu rtsa bdun pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2027: de nas gnyis su med pa bla na med pa'i
NK106(me)003:2028: rgyud kyi don sgyu 'phrul dra ba chen po bsgom
NK106(me)003:2029: pa la / bskyed rdzogs spyir bsgom pa dang /
NK106(me)003:2030: zab lam bye brag tu bsgom pa gnyis las /
NK106(me)003:2032: skye ba bzhi'i bag chags sbyong tshul la ltos nas bsgom tshul bzhi las /
NK106(me)003:2033: sgong skyes sbyong ba rgyas pa chen po'i bskyed rim ni /
NK106(me)003:2034: skyabs su 'gro ba dang byang chub tu sems bskyed nas /
NK106(me)003:2035: mdun gyi nam mkhar zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te /
NK106(me)003:2036: mchod pa dang bstod pa dang gsol ba gdab pa
NK106(me)003:2037: dang sdom pa bzung ba rnams ye shes sku mchog
NK106(me)003:2038: gi tshig gi phyir sems gzhol bas byas te /
NK106(me)003:2039: slar yang badz+ra muhs stong pa'i ngang du mnyam par bzhag nas /
NK106(me)003:2042: rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pa'i a dkar las lha'i
NK106(me)003:2043: sa bon dkyil 'khor so so'i gdan la babs nas
NK106(me)003:2044: / lhar gyur pa'i tshul gyis sgyu 'phrul zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
NK106(me)003:2049: rgyas par byas nas tshogs la rol ba'am med kyang rung ste /
NK106(me)003:2050: rdzogs rim gnyis po bsgoms la bsngo ba bya'o //
NK106(me)003:2051: 'di dag rgyas par zhi ba rin po che'i dra ba dang /
NK106(me)003:2052: khro bo snang ba rgyan du blta bar bya'o //
NK106(me)003:2053: khrid rkang dgu bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2054: de nas mngal skyes sbyong ba rgyas pa 'bring gi bsgom tshul ni sngar las /
NK106(me)003:2055: bsod nams zhing bsam ste mi dmigs pa bor la /
NK106(me)003:2056: gzhan de dang 'dra bar bsgom pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2057: khrid rkang dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2058: de nas drod gsher skyes kyi bar chags sbyang ba'i phyir bsdus pa bsgom pa ni /
NK106(me)003:2060: stong pa'i ngang las rten gzhal yas khang dang /
NK106(me)003:2061: brten pa lha'i dkyil 'khor rnams so so'i mtshan brjod pa tsam gyis zhi khro'i lhar gsal btab pas /
NK106(me)003:2062: 'di ni dbang rdzogs zhes pa nas /
NK106(me)003:2063: thams cad lha dang lha mo'i ngang //
NK106(me)003:2064: zhes pa'i bar lan cig brjod nas rang nyid ye
NK106(me)003:2065: nas lha'i rang bzhin du sangs rgyas pa'i ngo bor
NK106(me)003:2066: rtogs pa las / thugs ka'i pad+ma nyi zla'i steng
NK106(me)003:2067: gi kun bzang yab yum gyi h+aum las 'od 'phros
NK106(me)003:2068: rtogs pa las / / ma rtogs pa'i sems can gyi sgrib pa sbyangs /
NK106(me)003:2071: sngags kyi rang sgras 'jig rten khyab par bsams la /
NK106(me)003:2073: h+aum t+r+aam h+r+aihahzhesa ci 'grub bzlas la /
NK106(me)003:2074: rdzogs rim gnyis gang rung bsgoms nas bsngo ba bya'o //
NK106(me)003:2076: de nas rdzus skyes kyi bag chags sbyang ba shin tu bsdus pa ni /
NK106(me)003:2078: stong pa'i ngang las skad cig gis gsal btab nas sngags bzlas te rdzogs rim bsgoms pa las /
NK106(me)003:2079: skabs 'dir sems bskyed nas nam mkha'i dkyil du nyi
NK106(me)003:2080: zla'i steng na kun bzang yab yum zhal sbyar rdo
NK106(me)003:2081: rje skyil krung mnyam gzhag mdzad pa las /
NK106(me)003:2082: 'od 'phros snang srid thams cad ye shes lnga'i zhing khams su dag par byas /
NK106(me)003:2083: 'khor 'das thams cad ro gcig ye nas dag pa'i sangs rgyas su gsal btab la /
NK106(me)003:2084: +aahh+aum zhes ci 'grub bzlas nas de'i ngang la glod pas bsam mi khyab pa'i 'od gsal 'char ro //
NK106(me)003:2086: 'di ni rgyal ba gcig bsgoms kun gyi ngang //
NK106(me)003:2088: rigs thams cad kyi bdag po /
NK106(me)003:2089: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dbang phyug /
NK106(me)003:2090: rang byung gdod ma'i mgon po /
NK106(me)003:2091: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mes po dam pa bsgom pa'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)003:2093: mkha' dkyil dngas pa'i dbyings nyi zla //
NK106(me)003:2094: ye shes rgyal po stong gsal bsgom //
NK106(me)003:2095: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa //
NK106(me)003:2098: khrid rkang brgya dang gcig pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2099: de nas zab lam bye brag tu bsgom pa la /
NK106(me)003:2100: byin rlabs dngos grub kyi gnad /
NK106(me)003:2102: dngos gzhi khyad par gyi gnad dang gsum las /
NK106(me)003:2104: skyabs su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed nas /
NK106(me)003:2105: stong pa'i ngang las rang nyid lhar bskyed pa'i spyi bor bla ma'i rnal 'byor /
NK106(me)003:2106: yab yum 'khril sbyor can dpa' bo mkha' 'gro zung 'jug mdzad par bsgoms la /
NK106(me)003:2110: sbyor mtshams nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun bab pas lus ngag yid gsum la thim /
NK106(me)003:2112: de thams cad bde ba'i ngo bor zhu ba rang
NK106(me)003:2113: gi snying gar bab pas gnyis su med pa'i ye
NK106(me)003:2114: shes rdo rje'i rang bzhin tshig dbang rin po che
NK106(me)003:2115: rang 'khrungs su thob par bsams la dar cig glod
NK106(me)003:2116: la bzhag / rjes la bsngo ba bya'o //
NK106(me)003:2121: dngos grub rnam gnyis thob pa'i phyir rab tu gsang ba'i gnad do //
NK106(me)003:2122: khrid rkang brgya dang gnyis pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2123: de nas sngon 'gro lam sel gyi gnad la gsum las /
NK106(me)003:2124: rtsa sbyang ba stong ra'i gnad ni /
NK106(me)003:2125: sngon 'gro bshad ma thag pa ltar bsgoms la /
NK106(me)003:2126: 'khor lo bzhi'i dbus na ro rkyang kun 'dar ma
NK106(me)003:2127: gsum ka ba'i tshul du yod pa'i nang sbug ma
NK106(me)003:2128: stong sang nge ba la dmigs pa 'dzin pa yin
NK106(me)003:2129: te / gtso mo dbu ma'i nang phru ma phus btab pa lta bu /
NK106(me)003:2130: dang po mda' smyug gi nang tsam /
NK106(me)003:2132: de nas bzho zo'i nang tsam /
NK106(me)003:2133: de nas lus thams cad dbu ma'i nang tsam du bsgom mo //
NK106(me)003:2134: 'dis ni rlung sems thams cad ngang gis dbu mar tshud pa'i gnad do //
NK106(me)003:2135: khrid rkang brgya dang gsum pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2136: de nas rlung sbyang ba srog gi gnad ni /
NK106(me)003:2137: de ltar dbu ma dang 'khor lo bzhi stong par
NK106(me)003:2138: gsal ba'i g.yas g.yon gyi ro rkyang yar sna gnyis
NK106(me)003:2139: smin mtshams nas sna bug gi nang gnyis la zug
NK106(me)003:2140: cing / mar sna gnyis lte ba'i 'og sor bzhi'i
NK106(me)003:2141: cha sbun gu'i thang nas dbu mar gug pa'i sna
NK106(me)003:2143: rlung ro bus nas phyir 'phang dus nad dang sdig sgrib thams cad phyir sangs /
NK106(me)003:2144: nang du 'dren dus snod bcud brtan g.yo'i 'jig rten /
NK106(me)003:2145: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan dang bcas
NK106(me)003:2146: pa rlung gi rnam pas sna bug nas ro rkyang
NK106(me)003:2147: gi nang la byung ba dbu ma'i nang du tshud
NK106(me)003:2148: pa la dmigs pa bzung nas /
NK106(me)003:2150: rang bab kyi 'byung rngub las cha babs su 'dzin pa ni gnad yang dag pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2151: de ltar byas pas rlung skyon med par ngang gis rlung zin cing 'byongs pa'i gnad do //
NK106(me)003:2152: khrid rkang brgya dang bzhi pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2153: de nas thig le sbyang ba rtsol ba'i gnad ni /
NK106(me)003:2154: gtum mo'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa ste /
NK106(me)003:2155: rlung bsgoms pa yan chad sngar bzhin byas pa'i lte
NK106(me)003:2156: ba'i thad sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus dbu ma'i nang
NK106(me)003:2157: nas / me'i dngas ma rgya khab kyi rtse'am nyungs kar gyi yang zhun tsam la /
NK106(me)003:2158: a shad kyi rnam pa can reg bya shin tu tsha ba zhig bsgoms la /
NK106(me)003:2159: ro rkyang gi rlung dbu ma'i mar snar zhugs pa'i
NK106(me)003:2160: dngas ma des spar bas me rta rnga'i nyag tsam
NK106(me)003:2161: 'bar ba / dbu ma'i nang bde chen 'khor lo'i
NK106(me)003:2162: thad ka'i dkyil na ham mgo thur du blta ba
NK106(me)003:2163: sran ma'i ga'u tsam la reg pas /
NK106(me)003:2164: thig le dkar dmar gyi thigs pa phra mo mar bab /
NK106(me)003:2166: de bas kyang ma cher 'bar ba bzhin /
NK106(me)003:2167: ham las thigs pa cher bab pas dbu ma'i nang khengs /
NK106(me)003:2168: dngas ma 'khor lo bzhi'i rtsa 'dab stong pa rnams gang ba la ma yengs par bsgoms pas /
NK106(me)003:2169: lus sems bde ba chen po ngang gis 'char ro //
NK106(me)003:2170: khrid rkang brgya dang lnga pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2171: de nas dngos gzhi khyad par gyi gdan la /
NK106(me)003:2174: kun tu bzang po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes dang gsum las /
NK106(me)003:2176: bde chen 'khor lo'i man ngag ni /
NK106(me)003:2177: 'khor lo bzhi'i dbus na dbu ma ye shes kyi rtsal /
NK106(me)003:2178: dngas ma'i dngas ma dkar dmar 'dres pa nyungs 'bru tsam gyi rten la /
NK106(me)003:2179: 'od lnga'i gong bu sran ma rdog po tsam re
NK106(me)003:2180: bsams pa'i spyi gtsug gi dngas ma nyungs 'bru tsam
NK106(me)003:2181: la mgrin pa'i dngas ma 'od dang bcas pa'i drod
NK106(me)003:2182: kyis bzhu bas / byang chub sems kyi thigs pa
NK106(me)003:2183: skra'i nyag tsam bab pas spyi bo'i rtsa 'dab dang
NK106(me)003:2184: kyis bzhu bas / / mgrin pa'i rten gyi dngas ma la zhugs /
NK106(me)003:2185: tshad med pa'i bde bas khyab par bsams la 'jam rlung rang ni rab zung ngo //
NK106(me)003:2186: khrid rkang brgya dang drug pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2187: de nas snying ga'i 'od dang dngas ma'i drod kyis mgrin pa'i rten gyi dngas ma zhu bas /
NK106(me)003:2188: longs spyod 'khor lo'i rtsa 'dab dang snying ga'i rten la zhugs /
NK106(me)003:2189: zag pa med pa'i bde ba skyes par bsam mo //
NK106(me)003:2190: khrid rkang brgya dang bdun pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2191: de nas lte ba'i 'od dang thig le'i drod kyis snying ga'i rten gyi dngas ma zhu bas /
NK106(me)003:2193: lte ba'i rten gyi thig le la zhugs /
NK106(me)003:2194: mchog tu bde ba'i ye shes skyes par bsam mo //
NK106(me)003:2195: khrid rkang brgya dang brgyad pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2196: de nas snying ga'i 'od dang rten gyi dngas ma'i drod mar song /
NK106(me)003:2197: lte ba'i rten gyi dngas ma zhu ba'i dngas ma
NK106(me)003:2198: rlangs kyi tshul du rags pa ma yin phra la
NK106(me)003:2199: dngas par sprul pa'i 'khor lo rtsa 'dab dang /
NK106(me)003:2200: ro rkyang dbu ma'i nang kun khyab par zhugs pas nye bar zhi ba'i bde bas khyab ste /
NK106(me)003:2201: dga' ba bzhi'i ye shes skyes par bsam mo //
NK106(me)003:2202: khrid rkang brgya dang dgu pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2203: de nas mas bstan gyi ye shes la'ang bzhi las /
NK106(me)003:2204: dang po snying ga'i 'od las zer 'phros te lte
NK106(me)003:2205: bar song bas thig le rten dang bcas pa je
NK106(me)003:2206: phra je chung la yar 'dus snying ga'i 'od dang
NK106(me)003:2207: thig le la thim pa'i ngang la gzhag go //
NK106(me)003:2208: khrid rkang brgya dang bcu pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2209: de nas 'od zer mgrin par 'phros je phra las snying gar 'dus pa'i ngang la gzhag go //
NK106(me)003:2210: khrid rkang brgya dang bcu gcig pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2211: de nas yang 'od zer spyi bo'i thig le rten dang bcas pa la phog pas /
NK106(me)003:2212: je phra je chung las snying gar 'dus pa'i ngang la gzhag go //
NK106(me)003:2213: khrid rkang brgya dang bcu gnyis pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2214: de nas snying ga'i rtsa 'dab kyi dngas ma la 'dus /
NK106(me)003:2215: de yang brten pa thig le sran ma tsam la 'dus /
NK106(me)003:2216: 'od lnga po'ang dbus kyi mthing ga nam mkha' lta bu'i ngang du 'dus /
NK106(me)003:2217: de yang gdangs je phra las mthar yid la mi
NK106(me)003:2218: byed pa kun tu bzang mo chos nyid stong pa
NK106(me)003:2219: chen po'i dbyings su dag pa'i ngang la mnyam par
NK106(me)003:2220: gzhag go // khrid rkang brgya dang bcu gsum pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2221: de nas kun tu bzang mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes ni /
NK106(me)003:2222: de'i tshe lus ri rgyal ltar mi g.yo /
NK106(me)003:2223: ngag lkugs pa ltar mi brjod /
NK106(me)003:2224: sems nam mkha' ltar mi rtog pa'i ngang la bzhag pas /
NK106(me)003:2225: gang yang yid la mi byed pa'i stong pa ni
NK106(me)003:2226: kun tu bzang mo chos nyid don gyi ye shes
NK106(me)003:2227: la / rang gsal dngas dang bcas pa'i rig pa
NK106(me)003:2228: gsal dngas phyed pa'i snang cha ni kun tu bzang
NK106(me)003:2229: po chos sku gzhi'i ye shes te /
NK106(me)003:2230: de gnyis dbyer med rig pa phyi nang bar med
NK106(me)003:2231: du phyam gdal ba ni dbyings dang ye shes dbyer
NK106(me)003:2232: med kun bzang yab yum zung 'jug gnyug ma'i ye
NK106(me)003:2233: shes rdzogs pa chen po zhes bya'o //
NK106(me)003:2234: tshul 'di ni sgyu 'phrul don gyi rdzogs rim bla
NK106(me)003:2235: na med pa'i mthar thug nges pa don gyi bcud
NK106(me)003:2236: kyi snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i gnad
NK106(me)003:2237: bstan pa'o // khrid rkang brgya dang bcu bzhi pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2238: tshul 'di gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i lam //
NK106(me)003:2239: zab cing rgya che gsang ba mchog gi gnas //
NK106(me)003:2240: myur du rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgrub byed yin //
NK106(me)003:2241: skal bzang skye bos dang du blang bar mdzod //
NK106(me)003:2242: dge ba 'di yis ma lus 'gro ba kun //
NK106(me)003:2243: gsang sngags rdo rje theg la rab zhugs te //
NK106(me)003:2244: nyin mtshan rim gnyis 'khor lo'i bzhon pa yis //
NK106(me)003:2245: dngos grub yid bzhin gling du phyin par shog /
NK106(me)003:2246: sna tshogs khams can 'khor ba'i rang bzhin ngang //
NK106(me)003:2247: gnyis med mya ngan 'das pa ro gcig tu //
NK106(me)003:2248: nam zhig nus ldan thabs kyis 'dres pa'i tshe //
NK106(me)003:2249: gzhan don lhun grub chos kyi char 'bebs shog /
NK106(me)003:2250: rdzogs pa chen po sems nyid ngal gso'i don khrid
NK106(me)003:2251: byang chub lam bzang las bar du dge ba 'bras
NK106(me)003:2252: bu gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i gnas bstan pa
NK106(me)003:2253: ste gnyis pa'o //// spyi don gsum pa gsang ba
NK106(me)003:2254: nges don snying po'i 'bras bu rdzogs pa chen po
NK106(me)003:2255: bla na med pa'i theg pa tha mar dge ba'i
NK106(me)003:2256: khrid kyi rim pa rgya cher bstan pa las /
NK106(me)003:2257: de'ang rgyu 'bras kyi theg pa blang dor bya rtsol dang bcas pa las ches 'phags pa /
NK106(me)003:2258: rang byung gi ye shes la lhun gyis grub par
NK106(me)003:2259: ye nas gnas pas sgo gsum bya rtsol las 'das
NK106(me)003:2260: pa'i chos nyid rdo rje rtse mo a ti don
NK106(me)003:2261: gyi snying po nges don mngon du ston pa'i tshul
NK106(me)003:2262: nyams su blang ba la don rnam pa gnyis te
NK106(me)003:2263: / bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa dang gdams khrid bstan pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2265: spyir rdzogs pa chen po sems sde klong sde man
NK106(me)003:2266: ngag gi sde gsum bsdus pa'i snying po yin pas
NK106(me)003:2267: rgyud rim tha dad du bgrang du yod na'ang /
NK106(me)003:2268: gtso bo gnad thog gi me btsa' ltar ston pas man ngag gi sde yin la /
NK106(me)003:2269: de'i nang nas kyang bla na med pa man ngag gi sde las /
NK106(me)003:2270: dmigs pa yul gyi blo can rnams 'jug pa dang
NK106(me)003:2271: khregs chod dbang po yang rab kyi chos su bstan
NK106(me)003:2272: pa dag gi nyams len dang mthun par bstan pa'i
NK106(me)003:2273: phyir / rgyal ba dgongs pa'i brgyud pa /
NK106(me)003:2275: gang zag snyan khung brgyud pa gsum las /
NK106(me)003:2277: chos sku kun du bzang po /
NK106(me)003:2280: ston pa rdo rje sems dpa'/
NK106(me)003:2281: gsang bdag phyag na rdo rje'o //
NK106(me)003:2283: sprul sku dga' rab rdo rje /
NK106(me)003:2286: rgyal ba dz+ny+aa na s+au tra /
NK106(me)003:2287: pan chen bi ma la mi tra'o //
NK106(me)003:2290: gnas brtan ldang ma lhun gyi rgyal mtshan /
NK106(me)003:2291: lce btsun seng ge dbang phyug /
NK106(me)003:2292: sprul sku rgyal ba zhang ston /
NK106(me)003:2296: grub chen zla ba mun sel /
NK106(me)003:2297: rig 'dzin gyi sa la gshegs pa chos kyi rje rin po che ku m+aa r+aa tsa /
NK106(me)003:2298: kun mkhyen ngag gi dbang po man chad gong bzhin no //
NK106(me)003:2299: rang bzhin rnam dag chos sku kun bzang dang /
NK106(me)003:2300: lhun grub 'od gsal bde chen longs spyod rdzogs //
NK106(me)003:2301: sna tshogs sprul pas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa //
NK106(me)003:2302: brgyud gsum bla ma rnams la gus phyag 'tshal //
NK106(me)003:2303: don gnyis pa gdams khrid rgya cher bstan pa la gsum ste /
NK106(me)003:2308: phyi gzung ba yul med stong par bstan pa dang /
NK106(me)003:2309: nang 'dzin pa gzhi med rtsa bral du bstan pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2311: snang ba bden med kyi gzugs brnyan sgyu ma'i dpe brgyad du bstan pa dang /
NK106(me)003:2312: de nyid dpyad na mi rnyed pa yul med stong par bstan pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2314: 'di ltar snang srid 'khor 'das snod bcud kyis bsdus
NK106(me)003:2315: pa'i gzugs sogs yul lngar snang ba'i cha thams cad
NK106(me)003:2316: ni med bzhin rang snang tsam du snang ba ste
NK106(me)003:2317: / de'ang bde bar gshegs pa la dag pa'i snang ba dang /
NK106(me)003:2318: sems can la 'khrul pa'i snang bar snang ngo cog
NK106(me)003:2319: thams cad sems dang ye shes kyi snang bar bstan
NK106(me)003:2320: la / de gnyis ka yang ji ltar snang bzhin
NK106(me)003:2321: pa'i dus nas snang la rang bzhin med pa me
NK106(me)003:2322: long nang gi gzugs brnyan nam mkha'i 'ja' tshon ltar
NK106(me)003:2323: la / gnas te / ye shes kyi dag snang
NK106(me)003:2324: la gzung 'dzin gyi dri ma med pas yod med
NK106(me)003:2326: skye 'jig dang 'pho 'gyur med pas 'dul byas kyi mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid chad pa /
NK106(me)003:2327: 'dus ma byas kyi stong gzugs snang ba /
NK106(me)003:2328: kun tu spros pa dang bral ba'i rang bzhin can no //
NK106(me)003:2329: sems 'khrul snang la bdag 'dzin gyi yul du byed pa /
NK106(me)003:2330: yod med kyi ris su chad cing 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid chad pa /
NK106(me)003:2331: rkyen snang glo bur ba'i rang snang bag chags brtas
NK106(me)003:2332: pa ba'i rang bzhin du de ltar snang ba tsam
NK106(me)003:2333: ste / skabs 'dir gzung ba sems kyi 'khrul snang bden med du shes par byed do //
NK106(me)003:2334: de'ang 'di ltar phyi rol dkar dmar sna tshogs su
NK106(me)003:2335: snang ba 'di dag rmi lam ltar bag chags brtas
NK106(me)003:2336: pa'i snang ba ma rig pa'i gnyid kyis myos pa
NK106(me)003:2338: don la grub pa ni cung zad kyang med la /
NK106(me)003:2339: snang ba'i dus nas sems kyang ma yin te /
NK106(me)003:2340: kha dog dang che chung dang ngos gzung la sogs
NK106(me)003:2341: pa sems kyi mtshan nyid dang rdzas 'gal bar 'jug
NK106(me)003:2342: pa'i phyir dang / sems las gzhan yang ma yin
NK106(me)003:2343: te 'khrul pa'i snang ba tsam las don gzhan bden
NK106(me)003:2344: pa gang du'ang ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)003:2345: sems la snang ba ni thog ma med pa nas
NK106(me)003:2346: brgyud pa'i bag chags brtas pa ba goms pa'i rnam
NK106(me)003:2347: pa tsam ste / sgyu ma'i ltad mo khar rtsang
NK106(me)003:2348: mthong ba'i bag chags mdang gi rmi lam du snang
NK106(me)003:2350: de'i phyir ji ltar snang yang med pa gsal bar snang ba /
NK106(me)003:2358: dri za'i grong khyer gyi rnam pa ltar /
NK106(me)003:2362: ngos gzung med pa stong pa'i rang bzhin gsal bar snang ba tsam mo snyam du /
NK106(me)003:2370: 'gro 'dug la sogs pa gang ci byed ci snang
NK106(me)003:2371: ba thams cad la bden med du lam lam rtsal
NK106(me)003:2372: sbyang zhing / sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas nyams su blang ngo //
NK106(me)003:2373: khrid rkang brgya dang bco lnga pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2374: de nas dpyad na yul med stong par bstan pa ni /
NK106(me)003:2375: 'di ltar snang ba thams cad kyang rags phra rdul
NK106(me)003:2376: phran du brtags na cha med ci yang ma grub
NK106(me)003:2378: kha dog ngos gzung gis brtags pas sgra stong pa dang /
NK106(me)003:2379: rnam pa ngo bo brtags pas dri stong pa dang /
NK106(me)003:2380: myong ba cha shas la brtags pas ro stong pa dang /
NK106(me)003:2381: khyad par skye mched la brtags pas reg stong par thug ste /
NK106(me)003:2382: yul du snang ba mi 'dra yang rang ngo stong par khyad par mtshungs pas /
NK106(me)003:2383: yul tha dad kyi stong pa la ris so so
NK106(me)003:2384: ba med par bar snang dag pa ltar tha dad
NK106(me)003:2385: ma yin gcig las 'das pa'i rang bzhin ni /
NK106(me)003:2386: yul snang ngo bo nyid kyis stong par gnas pa'i rang bzhin la /
NK106(me)003:2387: sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas nyams su blang ngo //
NK106(me)003:2388: khrid rkang brgya dang bcu drug pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2389: de nas 'dzin pa gzhi med rtsa bral du bstan pa la gnyis las /
NK106(me)003:2390: shes pa rang gsal rten med du bstan pa ni /
NK106(me)003:2391: 'di ltar gzugs sogs lngar 'char ba dbang po'i shes pa lnga dang /
NK106(me)003:2392: don spyi sems kyis brlabs shing yul du byas pa yid kyi shes pa dang /
NK106(me)003:2393: dgag sgrub chags sdang du rtogs pa nyon yid kyi shes pa dang /
NK106(me)003:2394: bar ma yul du byed pa yid kyi shes pa tshogs drug gi rjes las skyes can dang /
NK106(me)003:2395: rtog med rang gsal yul dang ma 'brel ba kun gzhi'i rnam shes te /
NK106(me)003:2396: tshogs brgyad dam drug gi rang dus na shes pa'i rnam pa cir rtogs kyang sal le ba /
NK106(me)003:2398: rten med la rang gsal ba /
NK106(me)003:2399: gsal bar 'char yang dngos po med pa /
NK106(me)003:2400: med la snang la bar snang dag pa dang ser bu rdul med lta bu /
NK106(me)003:2401: gsal cha rang gnas pas nam mkha' sprin dengs lta bu /
NK106(me)003:2402: 'gyu cha ngos gzung gi dngos por med pas rlung lta bu /
NK106(me)003:2403: 'dzin par snang ba'i dus nas rang sangs ngos gzung med pa la /
NK106(me)003:2406: phyam me glod nas kyang 'dzin pa rang gi snang tshul la bltas pas /
NK106(me)003:2409: rang gsal rten med tsam gyi ngo bor rtogs par 'gyur ro //
NK106(me)003:2410: 'di yang sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bas nyams su blang ngo //
NK106(me)003:2411: khrid rkang brgya dang bcu bdun pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2412: de nas dpyad na rtsa bral stong par bstan pa ni /
NK106(me)003:2413: de ltar rang gsal rten med kyi shes pa'ang phyi snang ba /
NK106(me)003:2416: rang gnas shes pa rang gi ngo bo la /
NK106(me)003:2419: ngo bo ngos gzung la sogs par gzhig cing brtags
NK106(me)003:2420: pas ci'i ngo bor yang ma grub par rtsa ba
NK106(me)003:2422: yod med kyi mtha' dang bral ba'i gnas lugs rtogs par 'gyur ro //
NK106(me)003:2423: 'di dag gi dus na bla ma'i mos gus kho na gal che ste /
NK106(me)003:2424: khrid rkang brgya dang bco brgyad pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2425: don gnyis pa bsgoms pas ngang la bskyang ba la gnyis te /
NK106(me)003:2426: dbang po gsum gyi bsgom tshul spyir bstan pa dang /
NK106(me)003:2427: thabs la mkhas pa'i khyad par bye brag tu bshad pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2428: dang po ni gzhung du lta ba rtogs pa dang
NK106(me)003:2429: 'brel bas go sla bar bya ba'i phyir dbang po
NK106(me)003:2430: yang rab nas sngon la smos kyang /
NK106(me)003:2431: skabs 'dir 'jug tshul go rims kyi dbang du byas te /
NK106(me)003:2434: rab kyi bsgom tshul rim pas bstan par bya ba las /
NK106(me)003:2435: dang po dbang po tha ma'i rim pa la /
NK106(me)003:2441: bla ma'i rnal 'byor bsgoms pa'i rjes la /
NK106(me)003:2442: rnam snang gi chos bdun las /
NK106(me)003:2443: khyad par du lag pa gnyis pus mor bkab /
NK106(me)003:2444: mjing pa cung zad dgye bar byas te /
NK106(me)003:2445: rtsa gsum gsal btab pa'i ro rkyang gi mar sna
NK106(me)003:2446: nas 'od gsal gyi rlung du ba lta bu dkar
NK106(me)003:2447: la dngas pa sngo la 'phyur ba /
NK106(me)003:2451: mthing la skya ba lnga sgril thag pa brkyang ba ltar phar song /
NK106(me)003:2452: rlung tshur 'jug dus nang du zhugs pa'i khug pa
NK106(me)003:2453: la sems kyis gcig nas lnga'i bar bgrang zhing phreng
NK106(me)003:2454: ba re bskyur bas rnam rtog rags pa kun ngang
NK106(me)003:2456: khrid rkang brgya dang bcu dgu pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2457: de nas sems gzung ba ni /
NK106(me)003:2459: dngos gzhi mdun du bris sku'am po ti'am rde'u shing
NK106(me)003:2460: bu la sogs pa'i mtshan ma gcig bzhag pa la
NK106(me)003:2461: / sems ma yengs par ce re mig mi 'gul bar blta ba'i ngang la gzhag go //
NK106(me)003:2462: de'i dus su dgra lhang ba'am /
NK106(me)003:2464: rtog pa 'phro ba gang byung yang de dag ling bskyur rbad bcad nas /
NK106(me)003:2465: dmigs rten la ha re cher blta'o //
NK106(me)003:2466: de nas sems rtse gcig tu 'dug na mig btsums
NK106(me)003:2467: nas de'i rnam pa lam me ba la sems rtse
NK106(me)003:2468: gcig tu gtad nas bsgom mo //
NK106(me)003:2469: 'phro na yang mig phye la rten la blta'o //
NK106(me)003:2470: de ltar byas pas dbang po lnga'i snang yul lnga dang /
NK106(me)003:2471: yid kyi yul chos la sems rtse gcig 'dzin pa'i zhi gnas skye'o //
NK106(me)003:2472: khrid rkang brgya dang nyi shu pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2473: de nas zhar la sgra'i yul la'ang de ltar bslabs te /
NK106(me)003:2475: dngos gzhi mi sgra rlung sgra khyi sgra la sogs pa rna ba ma yengs par gtad nas bsgom /
NK106(me)003:2476: yang de'i rnam pa yid la byas la nang du
NK106(me)003:2477: blta zhing sgra dngos kyi nyan 'phro bor la bsgom
NK106(me)003:2478: / de gnyis res mos su byas pas sgra la sems zin par 'gyur ro //
NK106(me)003:2479: de bzhin du dri dang ro dang reg la'ang sbyor nas nyams su blangs pas /
NK106(me)003:2480: phyis bsgom dus yul lngas mi gnod cing grogs su 'gyur ba yin no //
NK106(me)003:2482: khrid rkang brgya dang nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2483: de nas chos la sbyang ba ni sngon 'gro sngar bzhin byas nas /
NK106(me)003:2484: dngos gzhi la bdag nyid lhar bskyed pa'i ngang las
NK106(me)003:2485: ma yengs par bzhag pas rtse gcig tu zin dus
NK106(me)003:2487: 'od zer gyi 'phro 'dus sems can gyi don byed pa'am /
NK106(me)003:2488: byams sogs tshad med bzhis sems can la bsgoms pa'i
NK106(me)003:2489: sems rtse gcig pa sa la la ba de ngos
NK106(me)003:2490: gzung zhing ma yengs par bya'o //
NK106(me)003:2491: de gnyis spel mar sbyangs pas 'phro gnas mnyam pa'i ngang la sems zin pa'i zhi gnas skye'o //
NK106(me)003:2492: 'di ni dmigs gnad gal po che'o //
NK106(me)003:2493: gnad 'di dag gis zhi gnas skye ba la thogs pa med par 'grub bo //
NK106(me)003:2494: khrid rkang brgya dang nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2495: de nas lhag mthong bskyed pa la gnyis las /
NK106(me)003:2496: phyi gzung ba yul med nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa'i ngang la gzhag pa ni /
NK106(me)003:2498: dngos gzhi 'di ltar sna tshogs su snang ba'i yul rnams rmi lam sgyu ma ltar snang la /
NK106(me)003:2499: dpyad na rdul phran cha med du'ang ma grub pas stong pa ste /
NK106(me)003:2500: yul snang du 'jal ba gzung ba'i shes pa dang
NK106(me)003:2501: bcas pa rang gsal stong pa'i ngang la phyam gyis
NK106(me)003:2503: des ni yul dang gzung ba'i shes pa bdag med par rtogs pa'i gnad do //
NK106(me)003:2504: khrid rkang brgya dang nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2505: de nas nang 'dzin pa rtsa bral stong par bstan pa ni /
NK106(me)003:2506: yul dang yul can du 'jal byed sems kyi rang bzhin la /
NK106(me)003:2510: dbyibs kha dog la sogs par brtags shing btsal bas gang du'ang ma rnyed pa'i tshe /
NK106(me)003:2511: rten med kyi shes pa 'dzin med kyi ngang du lhod kyis glod la gzhag go //
NK106(me)003:2512: 'dis ni nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa stong nyid du rtogs par byed do //
NK106(me)003:2513: khrid rkang brgya dang nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2514: de nas zung 'jug bsgom pa ni /
NK106(me)003:2515: sngar zhi lhag so sor bsgoms pa ste 'dir gcig tu bsres nas bsgom pa yin te /
NK106(me)003:2517: dngos gzhi gang snang la dpyad ra med par rang babs su phyal le /
NK106(me)003:2521: mtha' bral du khrol le gzhag go //
NK106(me)003:2522: de'i tshe phyi nang bar med nam mkha' lta bu'i dgongs pa 'char te /
NK106(me)003:2525: tha dad med pa zung 'jug gcig gi rang bzhin du lhun gyis grub pa yin no //
NK106(me)003:2526: khrid rkang brgya dang nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2527: de nas dbang po 'bring gis bsgom tshul la gsum las /
NK106(me)003:2528: stong pa nam mkha' lta bu'i bsgom tshul ni /
NK106(me)003:2529: lus mi g.yo ba ri rgyal ltar rnam snang chos bdun bca'/
NK106(me)003:2530: dbang po ma 'gags pa rang gsal du dngas pa rdzing bu'i zla gzugs ltar bzhag nas /
NK106(me)003:2531: gang snang yang snang thog der mi bzhag par stong
NK106(me)003:2532: thog gi steng phyi nang bar med har sangs su
NK106(me)003:2533: bun ne shigs se lta stangs gcun nas bzhag pas
NK106(me)003:2534: / thams cad stong pa bar med nam mkha' ltar rtogs par 'gyur ro //
NK106(me)003:2535: khrid rkang brgya dang nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2536: de nas gsal ba me long lta bu'i bsgom tshul ni /
NK106(me)003:2537: lus gnad dbang gnad de dang 'dra ba la /
NK106(me)003:2538: stong thog tu mi gtad par snang ba rang gsal
NK106(me)003:2539: 'dzin med kyi ngang la sal le wal le yer
NK106(me)003:2540: re bsgoms pas / snang la 'dzin med khral ma khrol gyi rtogs pa 'char ro //
NK106(me)003:2541: khrid rkang brgya dang nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2542: de 'char ba rba rlabs lta bu'i bsgom tshul ni /
NK106(me)003:2543: lus dang dbang gnad sngar bzhin /
NK106(me)003:2544: khyad par rig pa'i ngang nas 'phro 'du'i rtog pa 'char ba la gtad pas /
NK106(me)003:2545: rten med du 'dzin med grol ba rba rlabs chur thim pa lta bu'i rtogs pa 'char ro //
NK106(me)003:2546: khrid rkang brgya dang nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2547: de nas dbang po yang rab kyi bsgom pa ni /
NK106(me)003:2548: bar med chu bo rgyun gyi rang bzhin gtsang chab kyi gzhung lta bu ste /
NK106(me)003:2549: rig pa chos skur rtogs pas 'du 'phro chos nyid rol par shar cing nub pa'i phyir /
NK106(me)003:2550: spang blang dang gol sgrib gang yang med par thams cad rtogs pa'i gsal sbyang du shar ba ni /
NK106(me)003:2551: rin po che gser gling du phyin dus sa rdo phal pa btsal gyis mi rnyed pa ltar /
NK106(me)003:2552: blo la ci shar rang byung gi ye shes su
NK106(me)003:2553: shar bas 'dzin rtog ye grol kun bzang gi dgongs
NK106(me)003:2555: yul du ci snang stong pa'i rang gzugs su shar
NK106(me)003:2556: bas gzung rtog ye grol kun tu bzang mo'i klong
NK106(me)003:2558: yul dang sems zhes tha dad du 'dzin pa'i chos
NK106(me)003:2559: thams cad gnyis med rdzogs pa chen po'i dbyings su
NK106(me)003:2561: phyi dang nang med par ye shes kyi klong du shar /
NK106(me)003:2562: steng dang 'og med par gdal khod kyi khod du snyoms /
NK106(me)003:2563: phyogs dang mtshams med par rang byung gi ye shes su shar /
NK106(me)003:2564: phyogs dang ris med par chos nyid kyi rol pa shar /
NK106(me)003:2565: bdag dang gzhan med par gnas lugs kyi ngang du phyin /
NK106(me)003:2566: gnas dang dus med par gdod ma'i klong du phebs te /
NK106(me)003:2567: blo zad kyi rnal 'byor pa chos kyi ngang na bsams kyang bde ba'i dus so //
NK106(me)003:2568: 'di nyid rtogs pa bar med dang ngo sprad de
NK106(me)003:2569: rig pa rjen la phud nas zang nge thal le
NK106(me)003:2570: gcer bur lding ba'i shes pa /
NK106(me)003:2571: rang bab ma bsgoms rnal ma la thag bcad nas skyong du gzhug go //
NK106(me)003:2572: khrid rkang brgya dang nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2573: de nas thabs la mkhas pa'i khyad par bye brag tu bshad pa ni /
NK106(me)003:2574: bsgom tshul dang po gnyis kyi grogs dang rtsal sbyang bstan la /
NK106(me)003:2575: tha ma'i rkang stegs tsam du byung ste /
NK106(me)003:2576: 'di la zhi gnas lhag mthong zung 'brel la bzla dang bzhi las /
NK106(me)003:2577: dang po la'ang zhi gnas bsgrub pa dang /
NK106(me)003:2579: dang po la snang bcas snang med kyi yul gnyis las /
NK106(me)003:2580: snang med la sems gzung ba la /
NK106(me)003:2581: phyi'i dmigs rten snang bcas bris sku la sogs pa ste sngar mos pa bzhin no //
NK106(me)003:2582: nang gi snang bcas ni shes pa ha cang 'phros te mi gnas pa'i tshe /
NK106(me)003:2583: snying gi nang nas pad+ma dkar po'am /
NK106(me)003:2584: rdo rje rgya gram la sogs pa rtsa ba zug
NK106(me)003:2585: pa mar mar nas dbang chen gyi sa gzhi'i bar
NK106(me)003:2586: du song bas shes pa brtan par bsam mo //
NK106(me)003:2587: sems zin pa dang snying gar bsdus la rtse gcig tu bsgoms na mi rtog pa skye'o //
NK106(me)003:2588: khrid rkang brgya dang sum cu pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2589: de nas snang ba med kyi yul la gzung ba ni /
NK106(me)003:2590: gang yang yid la mi byed pa'i ngang la 'jog pa ste /
NK106(me)003:2591: de'i phyi nang gi dngos po gzhig nas stong par song ba'i ngang lta bu'am /
NK106(me)003:2592: lha'i zhal phyag bsgoms pas rtog pa gzhan rnams der nub /
NK106(me)003:2593: de nyid kyang rnam pa mi gsal ba'i ngang der 'jog pa lta bu la bslab par bya'o //
NK106(me)003:2594: dmigs pa med pa'i zhi gnas skye'o //
NK106(me)003:2595: 'di nyid mthong mthong 'dra la ma nges pa'i gnad zab yang dag pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2596: khrid rkang brgya dang sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2598: 'gro 'dug cung zad byas la sngar gyi de nyid la blta /
NK106(me)003:2599: smra brjod dang dran rtog cung zad bsres la zhi
NK106(me)003:2600: gnas la bltas pas goms te gong 'phel du 'gyur
NK106(me)003:2601: ro // ltengs na lus sems g.yengs nas rgod du bcug la /
NK106(me)003:2602: de nas bsgoms pas mchog tu gsal lo //
NK106(me)003:2603: khrid rkang brgya dang sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2604: de nas lhag mthong la bskyed pa dang /
NK106(me)003:2606: dang po la'ang snang ba dang stong pa gnyis kyi snang ba ni /
NK106(me)003:2607: 'di ltar chos can yul gyi snang ba 'di dag sgyu mar 'dug /
NK106(me)003:2608: rmi lam du 'dug snyam du gang snang snang bden med du sa la la bsgom mo //
NK106(me)003:2609: de yang sgyu ma lta bu dang sgyu mar 'dug snyam pa la khyad par che bas /
NK106(me)003:2611: 'di dngos su bsgom pa la sbyar ro //
NK106(me)003:2612: khrid rkang brgya dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2613: de nas stong pa la sbyang ba ni /
NK106(me)003:2614: chos su snang dus cher cher bltas tshad stong sang
NK106(me)003:2615: sang rjes med du blta zhing yid la mi byed
NK106(me)003:2616: pa nam mkha' lta bu'i ngang la gzhag go //
NK106(me)003:2617: sngar dpyad cing gzhig pa'i stong pa yin la /
NK106(me)003:2618: 'dir rang sangs thug phrad kyi stong par bstan pas khyad par che'o //
NK106(me)003:2619: khrid rkang brgya dang sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2621: spyod lam gang byed dang snang stong gtad yal stong pa gnyis bsres nas bsgom zhing /
NK106(me)003:2622: ltengs nas gzugs sogs du ma'i yul la skad cig
NK106(me)003:2623: kyang ma yengs par gsal stong 'dzin med du phyam
NK106(me)003:2625: khrid rkang brgya dang sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2628: dang po ni lus gnad bcas la /
NK106(me)003:2629: gang snang gang shar la 'dem kha mi byed par
NK106(me)003:2630: de nyid kyi rang dus 'char gzhi'i rig pa la
NK106(me)003:2632: phar mi dpyad pa tshur bzhag pa ni /
NK106(me)003:2633: gnad kyi yang zab gal po che'o //
NK106(me)003:2634: de nas 'phro gnas mnyam pa'i ngang la rtag tu gnas pas /
NK106(me)003:2635: 'gyu bas gnas pa la mi gnod pa /
NK106(me)003:2636: rig pa stong gsal 'char ba gsum 'dres kyi ngo
NK106(me)003:2637: bo sku gsum rang mal gyi dgongs pa la slebs
NK106(me)003:2638: pa yin no // khrid rkang brgya dang sum cu rtsa drug pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2640: nam mkha' dngas shing sprin med pa'i tshe /
NK106(me)003:2641: nyi ma la rgyab phyogs pas nam mkha'i mthongs su lta stangs gcun nas bltas pas /
NK106(me)003:2642: phyi'i dpes nam mkha' dag pa ltar /
NK106(me)003:2643: nang shes pa'i nam mkha' dag dus /
NK106(me)003:2644: gsang ba 'od gsal snying po'i nam mkha' dag pa
NK106(me)003:2645: mtha' dbus thams cad las 'das pa'i chos nyid skad
NK106(me)003:2647: bal po k+aa ma sh+r+ai'i gdams pa mchog tu zab mo'o //
NK106(me)003:2648: ltengs na zhi lhag so sor rtsal sbyangs /
NK106(me)003:2651: spyod lam kun dang bsre ba rtsal sbyang gi gnad do //
NK106(me)003:2652: khrid rkang brgya dang sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2653: de nas la bzla ba ni /
NK106(me)003:2654: de ltar bsgom dus nyams dang sems gnas kyi sgom pa dang /
NK106(me)003:2655: bzang rtog ngan rtog dag snang 'khrul snang thams cad rten med stong pa chen po /
NK106(me)003:2657: ris med mnyam pa chen po /
NK106(me)003:2658: gzhi bral yangs pa chen por ro gcig pas /
NK106(me)003:2663: snyems dang re dogs kyi 'khri ba chod la chos zad blo 'das chen po'i ngang la skyol cig /
NK106(me)003:2664: gdod ma byar med chen po'i dbyings su la zlos shig /
NK106(me)003:2665: phyir ma ldog cig ces yin thog tu blo bral gyi gding bca' 'o //
NK106(me)003:2666: khrid rkang brgya dang sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2667: don gsum pa 'bras bu re dogs spang ba la gsum ste /
NK106(me)003:2668: chos nyid dbyings kyi rang ngo //
NK106(me)003:2670: sku las ye shes kyi rol pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2672: 'khor 'das gang du'ang ma grub la gar yang rgya chad dang phyogs lhung med pa /
NK106(me)003:2673: gang gi'ang 'char gzhi'i byed pa ni dbyings don dam pa'i bden pa /
NK106(me)003:2674: rtogs bya rnams kyi mthar thug /
NK106(me)003:2675: zad pa rnams kyi phyi mo /
NK106(me)003:2676: thug pa rnams kyi mthar thug /
NK106(me)003:2677: gdod ma'i chos dbyings zhes bya ste /
NK106(me)003:2678: de nyid kyang so so rang byung gi ye shes las gzhan na med de /
NK106(me)003:2679: bla mas ngo sprad pa'i rang rig spros bral /
NK106(me)003:2680: rgya chad phyogs ltung med pa 'di rang yin no //
NK106(me)003:2681: gzhan nas btsal du med do //
NK106(me)003:2683: sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pas //
NK106(me)003:2684: sangs rgyas gzhan nas btsal du med //
NK106(me)003:2685: btsal yang rgyal bas mi rnyed do //
NK106(me)003:2687: de yang sangs rgyas kyi dbyings de glo bur gyi
NK106(me)003:2688: dri mas bsgribs pas rang bzhin rnam dag tu bzhag
NK106(me)003:2689: pa tsam las / ngo bo la bzang ngan med
NK106(me)003:2690: par shes par mdzod cig ces da ltar gyi rig
NK106(me)003:2691: stong chos dbyings lhun grub chen por thag bcad do
NK106(me)003:2692: pa tsam las / // khrid rkang brgya dang sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2693: de nas dbyings snang sku'i rang bzhin la lnga las /
NK106(me)003:2694: de yang dbyings de lta bu'i ngang la sku dang
NK106(me)003:2695: ye shes 'du 'bral med pa'i dgongs par bzhugs pa
NK106(me)003:2696: las / chos kyi sku ni dbyings de'i rang bzhin
NK106(me)003:2697: skye 'gag 'pho 'gyur med pa smra bsam brjod med
NK106(me)003:2698: chen por gnas pa'i cha de yin la /
NK106(me)003:2699: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni /
NK106(me)003:2701: rtag chad mtha' las 'das shing mtshan dpe lhun grub tu 'char ba'i cha de yin no //
NK106(me)003:2702: sprul pa'i sku ni 'char tshul go ma 'gags pas
NK106(me)003:2703: thugs rje phyogs med du 'phro ba'i cha de yin
NK106(me)003:2704: no // mngon par byang chub kyi sku ni dbyings
NK106(me)003:2705: na dri ma ye nas dag cing stobs bcu mi
NK106(me)003:2706: 'jigs pa bzhi la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos
NK106(me)003:2707: gang+g+aa'i klung gi bye ma snyed lhun grub tu mnga'
NK106(me)003:2709: mi 'gyur rdo rje'i sku ni dgongs pa dbyings kyi
NK106(me)003:2710: chos nyid dus gsum 'pho 'gyur med par bzhugs pa
NK106(me)003:2711: de yin no // de'ang glo bur ba'i dri ma dag ma dag tsam las /
NK106(me)003:2712: sems can pa'i dus kyi rig pa'i rang ngo stong /
NK106(me)003:2716: shes pa'i rang bzhin las mi 'gyur ba 'di kho
NK106(me)003:2717: na sku lnga'i char da lta nyid nas gnas pas
NK106(me)003:2718: / sku lnga gzhan nas mi tshol bar rang chas
NK106(me)003:2719: lhun grub chen por thag chod cig ces rig stong
NK106(me)003:2720: zang ka sku lnga lhun grub tu thag bcad do
NK106(me)003:2721: / // khrid rkang brgya dang bzhi bcu pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2722: de nas sku las ye shes kyi rol pa ni /
NK106(me)003:2723: chos kyi sku'i ye shes smra bsam brjod 'das chen po /
NK106(me)003:2724: longs spyod rdzogs pa sku'i ye shes mtshan nyid lnga ldan /
NK106(me)003:2725: sprul pa'i sku'i ye shes ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa zhes bya ba yang /
NK106(me)003:2726: glo bur ba'i dri mas dag ma dag las /
NK106(me)003:2727: rang chas su dbyings la cha tshang du yod pas /
NK106(me)003:2728: da lta'i gnas skabs kyi rig pa la tshang ste /
NK106(me)003:2729: rig stong so so rang rig /
NK106(me)003:2730: dug lnga rang grol rjes med /
NK106(me)003:2731: ngo bo dang khyad par ram /
NK106(me)003:2732: chos can dang chos nyid rig pa'i cha cha tsam las tshang zhing /
NK106(me)003:2733: khyad par du'ang 'dod chags kyi rtog pa rang kar skyes pa de nyon mongs rang mtshan yin yang /
NK106(me)003:2734: de'i ngos zin nas ngang la bzhag dus bde la
NK106(me)003:2735: 'dzin med du shar ba de so sor rtog pa'i
NK106(me)003:2736: ye shes / yul la sdang bar skyes pa de zhe sdang rang ka /
NK106(me)003:2737: ngos zin nas dngas gsal spros dang bral ba de me long ye shes /
NK106(me)003:2738: gang yin ngo mi shes par skyes pa de gti mug /
NK106(me)003:2739: ngos zin nas rtog med rang gsal du shar ba de chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes /
NK106(me)003:2740: kho bas nga mchog tu rlom pa de nga rgyal rang ka /
NK106(me)003:2741: ngos zin nas gnyis med rang mnyam du rtogs dus mnyam nyid ye shes /
NK106(me)003:2742: gzhan la 'gran sems su skyes pa de phrag dog rang ka /
NK106(me)003:2743: ngos zin nas ris med du dngas pa de bya grub ye shes te /
NK106(me)003:2744: rig pa la rang ma rig pa'i rtsal dug lngar shar yang /
NK106(me)003:2745: rang rig dus ye shes lnga'i rtsal lam rol par 'char bas /
NK106(me)003:2746: da lta nyid nas sku dang ye shes 'du 'bral
NK106(me)003:2747: med pa'i don rang chas su yod par thag chod
NK106(me)003:2748: la / re dogs dang som nyi ma byed /
NK106(me)003:2749: thag chod dpa' gding bskyed cig ces legs par ngo sprad do //
NK106(me)003:2750: khrid rkang brgya dang bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o //
NK106(me)003:2751: 'di ni yang gsang rdzogs pa chen po'i gnas //
NK106(me)003:2752: rgyu 'bras theg pa kun las 'phags pa ste //
NK106(me)003:2753: blo rab skal pa can gyi spyod yul las /
NK106(me)003:2754: kun gyi yul min rdo rje rtse mo yin //
NK106(me)003:2755: de ltar bkod pa'i dge bas 'gro ba kun //
NK106(me)003:2756: kun bzang rdzogs pa chen po'i gnas thob shog /
NK106(me)003:2757: rdzogs pa chen po sems nyid ngal gso'i don khrid byang chub lam bzang las /
NK106(me)003:2758: tha mar dge ba bla na med pa rdzogs pa chen po'i gnas bstan pa ste gsum pa'o ////
NK106(me)003:2759: de ltar rgyu 'bras lam bzang snying po'i don /
NK106(me)003:2760: mdo rgyud bstan bcos man ngag rgya che las //
NK106(me)003:2761: yang zab gnad rnams phyogs gcig 'dir bsdus te //
NK106(me)003:2762: khrid du bsdebs nas skal bzang rnams la 'bul //
NK106(me)003:2763: phyi rabs dad ldan rjes 'jug rigs kyi bu //
NK106(me)003:2764: thar lam 'dren pa'i ded dpon mchog rnams kyis //
NK106(me)003:2765: skal ldan slob ma'i tshogs rnams 'khrid pa na'ang //
NK106(me)003:2766: lo khrid la sogs shin tu 'byong bar gdab //
NK106(me)003:2767: bsdus 'bring rgyas pa shin tu rgyas pa bzhi //
NK106(me)003:2768: bsdus khrid zhag re dmigs pa re re dbog /
NK106(me)003:2769: zla ba bzhi dang zhag grangs nyer gcig na //
NK106(me)003:2770: phyi nang gsang ba'i chos kyi mdzod khang phye //
NK106(me)003:2771: 'bring khrid zhag gsum dmigs pa re re ste //
NK106(me)003:2772: lo gcig zla ba gnyis dang zhag gsum na //
NK106(me)003:2773: rgyu 'bras bla med theg pa'i drod tshad rnyed //
NK106(me)003:2774: thar lam byang chub snying por nges pa lags //
NK106(me)003:2775: rgyas khrid zhag lnga dmigs pa re re ste //
NK106(me)003:2776: lo gcig zla ba bcu gcig de bzhin du //
NK106(me)003:2777: zhag gi grangs ni bco lnga rdzogs pa na //
NK106(me)003:2778: mchog gsum snying po'i nges don mchog la reg /
NK106(me)003:2779: shin tu rgyas khrid zhag bdun dmigs pa re //
NK106(me)003:2780: lo gnyis zla drug zhag grangs nyer bdun na //
NK106(me)003:2781: theg mchog snying po'i don khrid rab rdzogs pas //
NK106(me)003:2782: mi ldog byang chub snying po'i sa la zhugs //
NK106(me)003:2783: de 'dra'i skye bo skal bzang brtson 'grus can //
NK106(me)003:2784: rgyal ba'i gdung 'tshob rigs mchog 'dzin pa des //
NK106(me)003:2785: rang gzhan don gnyis rdzogs pa'i sar gzhol te //
NK106(me)003:2786: myur du zhi ba byang chub snying por 'gro //
NK106(me)003:2787: de phyir phyi rabs skye bo'i tshogs rnams la //
NK106(me)003:2788: phan pa'i gdams ngag nges don snying por gdams //
NK106(me)003:2789: nyin mtshan mi dal dad brtson ldan pa yis //
NK106(me)003:2790: thar lam sgrub ces de skad thal mo sbyor //
NK106(me)003:2791: tshul 'di blo gros yangs pa'i nam mkha' las //
NK106(me)003:2792: ting 'dzin 'od gsal rtogs pa'i nyi 'od can //
NK106(me)003:2793: dri med 'od zer stong ldan shar ba des //
NK106(me)003:2794: gangs ri thod dkar mgul du legs par bkod //
NK106(me)003:2795: dge ba de yis bdag dang 'gro ba kun //
NK106(me)003:2796: srid pa'i nags khrod thibs po rab brgal te //
NK106(me)003:2797: zhi ba thar lam byang chub mchog zhugs nas //
NK106(me)003:2798: rnam grol rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par shog /
NK106(me)003:2799: chos tshul 'di yang bstan pa gnas kyi bar //
NK106(me)003:2800: 'jig rten kun tu 'gro la snang gyur te //
NK106(me)003:2801: dad brgya'i gtsug gi gus pas 'dzin byed cing //
NK106(me)003:2802: phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas par shog //
NK106(me)003:2803: rdzogs pa chen po sems nyid ngal gso'i gnas gsum
NK106(me)003:2804: dge ba gsum gyi don khrid byang chub lam bzang
NK106(me)003:2805: zhes bya ba / bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab
NK106(me)003:2806: kyi gnas la mang du thos pa'i nor gyis phyug
NK106(me)003:2807: zhes bya ba / pa / thag pa mchog gi
NK106(me)003:2808: rnal 'byor pa dri med 'od zer gyis gangs ri
NK106(me)003:2810: me tog sprin gyi skyed mos tshal gyi nang /
NK106(me)003:2811: kun tu bzang po'i khang bzangs su chos mtho ba'i khri rab tu bzang po la sbyar ba /
NK106(me)003:2812: phyogs dus kun tu bkra shis kyi dpal du 'bar
NK106(me)003:2813: bas shin tu dge zhing bkra shis par gyur cig
